CVE-2017-0326.title: Google Android NVIDIA Components Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2017-0326.body: Google Android is prone to multiple security vulnerabilities. An attacker can leverage these issues to execute arbitrary code within the context of a privileged process, obtain sensitive information or gain elevated privileges. These issues are being tracked by Android Bug IDs A-33968204 and A-33718700.

CVE-2017-0346.title: NVIDIA GPU Driver CVE-2017-0346 Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2017-0346.body: NVIDIA GPU Driver is prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability. A local attacker may exploit this issue to gain escalated privileges and perform unauthorized actions. Failed exploit attempts will likely cause denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2017-0357.title: iucode-tool CVE-2017-0357 Heap Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2017-0357.body: iucode-tool is prone to a heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability because it fails to properly bounds check user-supplied data before copying it into an insufficiently sized buffer. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of affected application or cause denial-of-service condition. iucode-tool 1.4 through 2.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-0888.body: Nextcloud Server is prone to a content-spoofing vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to manipulate and spoof content, which may aid in further attacks. Versions prior to Nextcloud Server 9.0.55 and 10.0.2 are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-1000002.title: ATutor Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2017-1000002.body: ATutor is prone to the following multiple security vulnerabilities: 1. An SQL-injection vulnerability 2. A directory-traversal vulnerability 3. A security-bypass vulnerability Exploiting these issues could allow an attacker to access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database, bypass security mechanism and obtain sensitive information. ATutor 2.2.1 and prior versions are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-1000014.title: phpMyAdmin PMASA-2017-3 Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2017-1000014.body: phpMyAdmin is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to cause denial-of-service conditions. phpMyAdmin versions 4.6.x prior to 4.6.6, 4.4.x prior to 4.4.15.10, and 4.0.x prior to 4.0.10.19 are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-1000015.title: phpMyAdmin PMASA-2017-4 Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2017-1000015.body: phpMyAdmin is prone to a security bypass vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to bypass security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions. This may aid in further attacks. All 4.6.x versions prior to 4.6.6, 4.4.x versions prior to 4.4.15.10, and 4.0.x versions prior to 4.0.10.19 are affected.

CVE-2017-1000018.title: phpMyAdmin PMASA-2017-7 Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2017-1000018.body: phpMyAdmin is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to cause denial-of-service conditions. phpMyAdmin versions 4.6.x prior to 4.6.6, 4.4.x prior to 4.4.15.10, and 4.0.x prior to 4.0.10.19 are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-1000085.title: Jenkins Subversion Plugin CVE-2017-1000085 Cross Site Request Forgery Vulnerability
CVE-2017-1000085.body: Subversion Plugin for Jenkins is prone to a cross-site request-forgery vulnerability. Exploiting this issue may allow a remote attacker to perform certain administrative actions and gain unauthorized access to the affected application. Other attacks are also possible. Subversion Plugin version 2.8 and prior are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-1000092.title: Jenkins Git Plugin CVE-2017-1000092 Cross Site Request Forgery Vulnerability
CVE-2017-1000092.body: Git Plugin for Jenkins is prone to a cross-site request-forgery vulnerability. Exploiting this issue may allow a remote attacker to perform certain unauthorized actions and gain access to the affected application. Other attacks are also possible. The following products are affected: Git Plugin 3.3.1 and prior. Git Plugin 2.4.0-beta-1 and prior.

CVE-2017-1000102.title: Jenkins Multiple Plugins Multiple HTML Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2017-1000102.body: Jenkins multiple plugins are prone to multiple HTML-injection vulnerabilities because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. Successful exploits will allow attacker-supplied HTML and script code to run in the context of the affected browser, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or control how the site is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible. The following products are affected: DRY Plugin 2.48 and prior versions are vulnerable. Static Analysis Utilities Plugin 1.91 and prior versions are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-1000103.title: Jenkins Multiple Plugins Multiple HTML Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2017-1000103.body: Jenkins multiple plugins are prone to multiple HTML-injection vulnerabilities because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. Successful exploits will allow attacker-supplied HTML and script code to run in the context of the affected browser, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or control how the site is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible. The following products are affected: DRY Plugin 2.48 and prior versions are vulnerable. Static Analysis Utilities Plugin 1.91 and prior versions are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-1000109.title: Jenkins OWASP Dependency-Check Plugin CVE-2017-1000109 HTML Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2017-1000109.body: The OWASP Dependency-Check Plugin for Jenkins is prone to an HTML-injection vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. Successful exploits will result in the execution of arbitrary attacker-supplied HTML and script code in the context of the affected application, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or control how the page is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible. OWASP Dependency-Check Plugin 2.0.1.1 and prior versions are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-1000114.title: Jenkins Datadog Plugin CVE-2017-1000114 Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2017-1000114.body: Datadog Plugin for Jenkins is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to gain access to sensitive information that may aid in further attacks. Datadog Plugin 0.5.6 and prior versions are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-1000228.title: Node.js ejs Package 'ejs.renderFile()' Function Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2017-1000228.body: The ejs Package for Node.js is prone to remote code-execution vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue allows attackers to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application. Failed exploits will result in denial-of-service conditions. Versions prior to ejs 2.5.3 are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-1000242.title: Jenkins Git Client Plugin CVE-2017-1000242 Insecure Temporary File Creation Vulnerability
CVE-2017-1000242.body: Git Client Plugin for Jenkins is prone to a security vulnerability because it creates temporary files in an insecure manner. An attacker can exploit this issue to gain access to sensitive information that may aid in further attacks. Git Client Plugin 2.4.2 and prior versions are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-1000244.title: Jenkins Favorite Plugin CVE-2017-1000244 Cross Site Request Forgery Vulnerability
CVE-2017-1000244.body: Favorite Plugin for Jenkins is prone to a cross-site request-forgery vulnerability. Exploiting this issue may allow a remote attacker to perform certain unauthorized actions and gain access to the affected application. Other attacks are also possible. Favorite Plugin 2.2.0 and 2.1.0 are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-1000255.title: Linux Kernel CVE-2017-1000255 Local Memory Corruption Vulnerability
CVE-2017-1000255.body: The Linux kernel is prone to a local memory-corruption vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to overwrite arbitrary locations with arbitrary values. Failed exploit attempts can result in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2017-1000354.title: Jenkins CVE-2017-1000354 User Impersonation Vulnerability
CVE-2017-1000354.body: Jenkins is prone to a user-impersonation vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to impersonate arbitrary users. This may aid in further attacks. The following products are vulnerable: Jenkins 2.56 and prior. Jenkins LTS 2.46.1 and prior.

CVE-2017-1000356.title: Jenkins CVE-2017-1000356 Multiple Cross Site Request Forgery Vulnerabilities
CVE-2017-1000356.body: Jenkins is prone to multiple cross-site request-forgery vulnerabilities. An attacker can exploit these issues to perform certain unauthorized actions and gain access to the affected application. Other attacks are also possible. The following versions are available: Jenkins 2.56 and prior. Jenkins LTS 2.46.1 and prior.

CVE-2017-1000375.title: NetBSD CVE-2017-1000375 Arbitrary Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2017-1000375.body: NetBSD is prone to an arbitrary code-execution vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected system.

CVE-2017-1000377.title: PAX Linux CVE-2017-1000377 Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2017-1000377.body: PAX Linux is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. Remote attackers can exploit this issue to bypass certain security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions.

CVE-2017-1000381.title: C-ares CVE-2017-1000381 Out of Bounds Read Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2017-1000381.body: C-ares is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information that may aid in launching further attacks. Failed exploit attempts will result in denial-of-service conditions. c-ares version 1.8.0 through 1.12.0 are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-1000383.title: GNU Emacs CVE-2017-1000383 Local Information Disclosure Vulnerability

CVE-2017-1000386.title: Jenkins Active Choices Plugin HTML Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2017-1000386.body: Active Choices Plugin for Jenkins is prone to an HTML-injection vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. Successful exploits will result in the execution of arbitrary attacker-supplied HTML and script code in the context of the affected application, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or control how the page is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible. Active Choices Plugin 1.5.3 and prior versions are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-1000391.title: Jenkins Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2017-1000391.body: Jenkins is prone to multiple security vulnerabilities. An attacker may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site and steal cookie-based authentication credentials, perform unauthorized actions within the context of the vulnerable application.

CVE-2017-1000392.title: RETIRED: Jenkins CVE-2017-1000392 HTML Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2017-1000392.body: Jenkins is prone to an HTML-injection vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. Successful exploits will result in the execution of arbitrary attacker-supplied HTML and script code in the context of the affected application, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or control how the page is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible.The following products are affected:Jenkins 2.88 and prior.Jenkins LTS 2.73.2 and prior.NOTE: This BID is being retired as it is a duplicate of BID 101773 (Jenkins Multiple Security Vulnerabilities).

CVE-2017-1000392.title: Jenkins Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2017-1000392.body: Jenkins is prone to multiple security vulnerabilities. An attacker may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site and steal cookie-based authentication credentials, perform unauthorized actions within the context of the vulnerable application.

CVE-2017-1000404.title: Jenkins Delivery Pipeline Plugin CVE-2017-1000404 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2017-1000404.body: The Delivery Pipeline Plugin for Jenkins is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may let the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Jenkins Delivery Pipeline Plugin 1.0.7 and prior versions are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-1000600.title: WordPress CVE-2017-1000600 Arbitrary File Upload Vulnerability
CVE-2017-1000600.body: WordPress is prone to an arbitrary file-upload vulnerability. An attacker may leverage this issue to upload arbitrary files to the affected computer; this can result in arbitrary code execution within the context of the vulnerable application.WordPress 4.8 and prior are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-1002004.title: WordPress DTracker Plugin Multiple SQL Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2017-1002004.body: The DTracker plugin for WordPress is prone to multiple SQL-injection vulnerabilities because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query. An attacker may leverage these issues to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database. DTracker 1.5 is vulnerable; other versions may also be vulnerable.

CVE-2017-1002005.title: WordPress DTracker Plugin Multiple SQL Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2017-1002005.body: The DTracker plugin for WordPress is prone to multiple SQL-injection vulnerabilities because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query. An attacker may leverage these issues to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database. DTracker 1.5 is vulnerable; other versions may also be vulnerable.

CVE-2017-10194.title: Oracle Integrated Lights Out Manager (ILOM) CVE-2017-10194 Remote Security Vulnerability
CVE-2017-10194.body: Oracle Integrated Lights Out Manager (ILOM) is prone to a remote security vulnerability in System Management. The vulnerability can be exploited over the 'HTTP' protocol. This vulnerability affects the following supported versions: Prior to 3.2.6

CVE-2017-10197.body: Oracle Hospitality OPERA 5 Property Services is prone to a local security vulnerability in Folios. This vulnerability affects the following supported versions: 5.4.2.x through 5.5.1.x

CVE-2017-10266.title: Oracle Tuxedo CVE-2017-10266 Remote Security Vulnerability
CVE-2017-10266.body: Oracle Tuxedo is prone to a remote security vulnerability that affects 'core' component.The vulnerability can be exploited over the 'Jolt' protocol. The 'core' component is affected.This vulnerability affects the following supported versions: 11.1.1, 12.1.1, 12.1.3, and 12.2.2

CVE-2017-10421.title: Oracle Hospitality Suite8 CVE-2017-10421 Remote Security Vulnerability
CVE-2017-10421.body: Oracle Hospitality Suite8 is prone to a remote security vulnerability in Leisure. The vulnerability can be exploited over the 'HTTP' protocol. This vulnerability affects the following supported versions: 8.10.1, 8.10.2

CVE-2017-10612.title: Juniper Networks JUNOS Space CVE-2017-10612 HTML Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2017-10612.body: Juniper Networks JUNOS Space is prone to an HTML-injection vulnerability because it fails to sanitize user-supplied input. Successful exploits will allow attacker-supplied HTML and script code to run in the context of the affected site, potentially allowing the attacker to escalate privileges or to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or control how the site is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible. Juniper Networks Junos Space prior to 17.1R1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-10622.title: Juniper Junos Space CVE-2017-10622 Authentication Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2017-10622.body: Juniper Junos Space is prone to an authentication-bypass vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to bypass the authentication mechanism and perform unauthorized actions. This may lead to further attacks.

CVE-2017-10701.title: SAP NetWeaver Web Dynpro Java Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2017-10701.body: SAP NetWeaver is prone to an cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. Remote attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks.

CVE-2017-10701.title: SAP GUI for HTML Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2017-10701.body: SAP GUI is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. Remote attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks.

CVE-2017-10701.title: SAP Web Dynpro ABAP Unspecified Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2017-10701.body: SAP Web Dynpro ABAP is prone to an unspecified cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. Remote attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks.

CVE-2017-10701.title: SAP Enterprise Portal Unspecified Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2017-10701.body: SAP Enterprise Portal is prone to an unspecified cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. Remote attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. SAP Enterprise Portal 7.50 and prior are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-10793.title: AT&T U-verse Arris Modems Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2017-10793.body: AT&T U-verse Arris Modems are prone to following security vulnerabilities: 1. An Hardcoded Credential Security Bypass vulnerability. 2. An information-disclosure vulnerability 3. A command injection vulnerability 4. A security-bypass vulnerability Attackers can exploit these issues to obtain sensitive information, execute arbitrary code and perform unauthorized actions., which may aid in further attacks. Failed exploit attempts may result in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2017-10948.title: Foxit Reader CVE-2017-10948 Use After Free Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2017-10948.body: Foxit Reader is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the application. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions. Foxit Reader 8.3.2.25013 and earlier are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-10949.title: Dell Storage Manager CVE-2017-10949 Directory Traversal Vulnerability
CVE-2017-10949.body: Storage Manager is prone to a directory-traversal vulnerability. Remote attackers may use a specially crafted request with directory-traversal sequences ('../') to retrieve sensitive information. This may aid in further attacks.

CVE-2017-10953.title: Foxit Reader CVE-2017-10953 Remote Command Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2017-10953.body: Foxit Reader is prone to a remote command-injection vulnerability. An attacker may exploit this issue to inject and execute arbitrary commands within the context of the affected application; this may aid in further attacks.

CVE-2017-10954.title: Bitdefender Internet Security CVE-2017-10954 Integer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2017-10954.body: Bitdefender Internet Security is prone to an integer-overflow vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of a different user. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2017-10955.title: EMC Data Protection Advisor CVE-2017-10955 Remote Command Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2017-10955.body: EMC Data Protection Advisor is prone to a remote command-injection vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue may allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2017-10974.title: Yaws CVE-2017-10974 Directory Traversal Vulnerability
CVE-2017-10974.body: Yaws is prone to a directory-traversal vulnerability. Remote attackers may use a specially crafted request with directory-traversal sequences ('../') to retrieve sensitive information. This may aid in further attacks. Yaws 1.91 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2017-12343.body: Cisco Data Center Network Manager is prone to multiple remote security vulnerabilities because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. CVE-2017-12589.title: ToMAX R60G CVE-2017-12589 Cross Site Request Forgery Vulnerability
CVE-2017-12589.body: ToMAX R60G is prone to a cross-site request-forgery vulnerability. Exploiting this issue allows a remote attacker to perform certain unauthorized actions and gain access to the affected application. Other attacks are also possible.

CVE-2017-12610.title: Apache Kafka CVE-2017-12610 User Impersonation Vulnerability
CVE-2017-12610.body: Apache Kafka is prone to a user-impersonation vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to impersonate arbitrary users. This may aid in further attacks. Apache Kafka 0.10.0.0 through 0.10.2.1, 0.11.0.0 through 0.11.0.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-12611.title: Apache Struts CVE-2017-12611 Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2017-12611.body: Apache Struts is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue may allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions. Apache Struts 2.0.1 through 2.3.33 and 2.5 through 2.5.10 are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-12625.title: Apache Hive CVE-2017-12625 Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2017-12625.body: Apache Hive is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information that may aid in launching further attacks. Failed attacks may cause a denial-of-service condition. Apache Hive 2.1.x prior to 2.1.2, 2.2.x prior to 2.2.1, and 2.3.x prior to 2.3.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-12680.title: NexusPHP CVE-2017-12680 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2017-12680.body: NexusPHP is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks. NexusPHP 1.5 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2017-12738.title: Multiple Siemens SICAM RTU Products Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2017-12738.body: Multiple Siemens SICAM RTU Products are prone to multiple security vulnerabilities. Attackers can exploit these issues to obtain sensitive information, to execute arbitrary code or arbitrary HTML or script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user within the context of the affected application. This can allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and aid in further attacks.

CVE-2017-1282.title: IBM Content Navigator CVE-2017-1282 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2017-1282.body: IBM Content Navigator is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks. The following versions are vulnerable: IBM Content Navigator versions 2.0.3.5 through 2.0.3.8 IBM Content Navigator version 3.0.0

CVE-2017-15919.title: WordPress Ultimate Form Builder Lite Plugin 'wp-admin/admin-ajax.php' SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2017-15919.body: The Ultimate Form Builder Lite plugin for WordPress is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query. Versions prior to Ultimate Form Builder Lite 1.3.7 are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-15946.body: The com_tag component for Joomla! is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query. CVE-2017-16231.title: PCRE CVE-2017-16231 Local Stack Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2017-16231.body: PCRE is prone to a local stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied input. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely cause a denial-of-service condition. PCRE 8.41 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2017-16237.body: Vir.IT Explorer Anti-Virus is prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability. Local attackers can exploit this issue to gain elevated privileges. Vir.IT Explorer Anti-Virus prior to version 8.5.42 are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-16540.body: OpenEMR is prone to remote privilege-escalation Vulnerability. Remote attackers can exploit this issue to gain elevated privileges and perform unauthorized actions. Other attacks are also possible.OpenEMR version prior to 5.0.0 Patch 5 are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-16607.title: NetGain Systems Enterprise Manager CVE-2017-16607 Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2017-16607.body: NetGain Systems enterprise manager is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information that may aid in further attacks.

CVE-2017-16639.body: Tor Browser is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this vulnerability to bypass intended security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions. This may aid in further attacks.Versions prior to Tor Browser 8.0 are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-16681.body: SAP Business Intelligence Promotion Management is prone to an unspecified cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. Remote attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks.

CVE-2017-16682.title: SAP Netweaver CVE-2017-16682 Remote Code Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2017-16682.body: SAP Netweaver is prone to a vulnerability that lets attackers inject and execute arbitrary code. CVE-2017-16684.body: SAP Business Intelligence Promotion Management is prone to an authentication-bypass vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to bypass certain security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions; this may aid in launching further attacks.

CVE-2017-16691.title: SAP NOTE Unspecified Security Vulnerability
CVE-2017-16691.body: SAP NOTE is prone to an unspecified security vulnerability. CVE-2017-16856.title: Atlassian Confluence CVE-2017-16856 Multiple Cross Site Scripting Vulnerabilities
CVE-2017-16856.body: Atlassian Confluence is prone to multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data. An attacker may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks. Versions prior to Atlassian Confluence 6.5.2 are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-16859.title: Atlassian Fisheye and Crucible CVE-2017-16859 Directory Traversal Vulnerability
CVE-2017-16859.body: Atlassian Fisheye and Crucible are prone to a directory-traversal vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker can exploit this issue using directory-traversal characters ('../') to access or read arbitrary files that contain sensitive information or to access files outside of the restricted directory to obtain sensitive information and perform other attacks. Fisheye and Crucible prior to 4.3.2, 4.4.0 prior to 4.4.3 and versions prior to 4.5.0 are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-16860.title: Atlassian Application Links CVE-2017-16860 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2017-16860.body: Atlassian Application Links is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. CVE-2017-17321.body: Huawei eNSP Software is prone to a local buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to adequately bounds-check user-supplied data before copying it into an insufficiently sized buffer. CVE-2017-17383.body: Jenkins is prone to multiple HTML-injection vulnerabilities because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. Successful exploits will result in the execution of arbitrary attacker-supplied HTML and script code in the context of the affected application, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or control how the page is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible. Jenkins 2.93 and prior versions are vulnerable.

The following versions are vulnerable:Atlassian Bitbucket Server 5.3.0 prior to 5.3.7Atlassian Bitbucket Server 5.4.0 prior to 5.4.6Atlassian Bitbucket Server 5.5.0 prior to 5.5.6Atlassian Bitbucket Server 5.6.0 prior to 5.6.3Atlassian Bitbucket Server 5.7.0 prior to 5.7.1Atlassian Bitbucket Server prior to 5.8.0

CVE-2017-18089.title: Atlassian Crucible CVE-2017-18089 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2017-18089.body: Atlassian Crucible is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary HTML and script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may let the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Versions prior to Atlassian Crucible 4.4.3 and 4.5.0 are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-18090.title: Atlassian Fisheye CVE-2017-18090 Multiple Cross Site Scripting Vulnerabilities
CVE-2017-18090.body: Atlassian Fisheye is prone to multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data. An attacker may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks. Versions prior to Atlassian Fisheye 4.5.1 and 4.6.0 are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-2307.title: Juniper Junos Space CVE-2017-2307 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2017-2307.body: Juniper Junos Space is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because they fail to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Versions prior to Juniper Junos Space 16.1R1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-2309.title: Juniper Junos Space CVE-2017-2309 Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2017-2309.body: Juniper Junos Space is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. Attackers can leverage this issue to gain access to sensitive information. Information obtained will aid in further attacks. Versions prior to Juniper Junos Space 16.1R1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-2316.title: Juniper NorthStar Controller Application CVE-2017-2316 Local Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2017-2316.body: Juniper NorthStar Controller Application is prone to a local buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied data. An attacker can exploit this issue to crash the affected application, resulting in denial-of-service condition. Due to the nature of this issue, arbitrary code execution may be possible but this has not been confirmed. Versions prior to Juniper NorthStar Controller Application 2.1.0 Service Pack 1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-2317.title: Juniper NorthStar Controller Application CVE-2017-2317 Unspecified Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2017-2317.body: Juniper NorthStar Controller Application is prone to an unspecified denial of service vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to cause a denial-of-service condition. Versions prior to Juniper NorthStar Controller Application 2.1.0 Service Pack 1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-2318.title: Juniper NorthStar Controller Application CVE-2017-2318 Remote Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2017-2318.body: Juniper NorthStar Controller Application is prone to a remote privilege-escalation vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this vulnerability to gain elevated privileges. Juniper NorthStar Controller Application before version 2.1.0 Service Pack 1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-2319.title: Juniper NorthStar Controller Application CVE-2017-2319 Authentication Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2017-2319.body: Juniper NorthStar Controller Application is prone to unspecified authentication bypass vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to bypass the authentication mechanism and perform unauthorized actions. This may lead to further attacks. Juniper NorthStar Controller Application before version 2.1.0 Service Pack 1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-2320.title: Juniper NorthStar Controller Application CVE-2017-2320 Remote Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2017-2320.body: Juniper NorthStar Controller Application is prone to a remote privilege-escalation vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this vulnerability to gain elevated privileges. Versions prior to Juniper NorthStar Controller Application 2.1.0 Service Pack 1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-2325.title: Juniper NorthStar Controller Application CVE-2017-2325 Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2017-2325.body: Juniper NorthStar Controller Application is prone to a buffer-overflow vulnerability. Successful exploits may allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code or cause denial-of-service conditions. Versions prior to Juniper NorthStar Controller Application 2.1.0 Service Pack 1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-2326.title: Juniper NorthStar Controller Application CVE-2017-2326 Local Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2017-2326.body: Juniper NorthStar Controller Application is prone to a local local security-bypass vulnerability. An attacker may exploit this issue to bypass certain security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions. Juniper NorthStar Controller Application before version 2.1.0 Service Pack 1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-2328.title: Juniper NorthStar Controller Application CVE-2017-2328 Local Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2017-2328.body: Juniper NorthStar Controller Application is prone to a unspecified local information-disclosure vulnerability. A local attacker can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information that may lead to further attacks. Versions prior to Juniper NorthStar Controller Application 2.1.0 Service Pack 1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-2329.title: Juniper NorthStar Controller Application CVE-2017-2329 Local Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2017-2329.body: Juniper NorthStar Controller Application is prone to an unspecified local denial of service vulnerability. A local attacker can exploit this issue to cause a denial-of-service condition. Versions prior to Juniper NorthStar Controller Application 2.1.0 Service Pack 1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-2332.title: Juniper NorthStar Controller Application CVE-2017-2332 Remote Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2017-2332.body: Juniper NorthStar Controller Application is prone to a remote privilege-escalation vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this vulnerability to gain elevated privileges.

CVE-2017-2334.title: Juniper NorthStar Controller Application CVE-2017-2334 Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2017-2334.body: Juniper NorthStar Controller Application is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. Successful exploits will allow attackers to bypass certain security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions. Versions prior to Juniper NorthStar Controller Application 2.1.0 Service Pack 1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-2477.title: Apple macOS CVE-2017-2477 Multiple Memory Corruption Vulnerabilities
CVE-2017-2477.body: Apple macOS is prone to multiple memory corruption vulnerabilities. Attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code and perform unauthorized actions. Failed exploit attempts may result in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2017-2489.title: Apple macOS CVE-2017-2489 Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2017-2489.body: Apple macOS is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information that may lead to further attacks.

CVE-2017-2490.title: Apple iOS/macOS/WatchOS/tvOS CVE-2017-2490 Memory Corruption Vulnerability
CVE-2017-2490.body: Apple iOS, WatchOS, macOS and tvOS are prone to a memory corruption vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the application. Failed exploit attempts may result in a denial-of-service condition. The following versions are affected: Versions prior to Apple iOS 10.3 Versions prior to Apple watchOS 3.2 Versions prior to Apple tvOS 10.2 Versions prior to Apple macOS 10.12.4

CVE-2017-2491.title: Apple Safari CVE-2017-2491 Use After Free Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2017-2491.body: Apple Safari is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely cause a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2017-2522.title: Apple iOS/macOS/WatchOS/tvOS CVE-2017-2522 Memory Corruption Vulnerability
CVE-2017-2522.body: Apple iOS, WatchOS, macOS and tvOS are prone to a memory corruption vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the application. Failed exploit attempts may result in a denial-of-service condition. The following versions fixes the issue: Versions prior to Apple iOS 10.3.2 Versions prior to Apple watchOS 3.2.2 Versions prior to Apple tvOS 10.2.1 Versions prior to Apple macOS 10.12.5

CVE-2017-2523.title: Apple iOS/macOS/WatchOS/tvOS CVE-2017-2523 Memory Corruption Vulnerability
CVE-2017-2523.body: Apple iOS, WatchOS, macOS and tvOS are prone to a memory corruption vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the application. Failed exploit attempts may result in a denial-of-service condition. The following versions fixes the issue: Versions prior to Apple iOS 10.3.2 Versions prior to Apple watchOS 3.2.2 Versions prior to Apple tvOS 10.2.1 Versions prior to Apple macOS 10.12.5

CVE-2017-2576.title: Moodle CVE-2017-2576 Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2017-2576.body: Moodle is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue may allow an attacker to bypass certain security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions. Moodle 3.2, 3.1 through 3.1.3, 3.0 through 3.0.7, 2.9 through 2.9.9, 2.8 through 2.8.12, 2.7 through 2.7.17 and prior are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-2578.title: Moodle CVE-2017-2578 HTML Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2017-2578.body: Moodle is prone to an HTML-injection vulnerability because it fails to sanitize user-supplied input. Successful exploits will allow attacker-supplied HTML and script code to run in the context of the affected site, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or control how the site is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible.

CVE-2017-2642.title: Moodle CVE-2017-2642 Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2017-2642.body: Moodle is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue may allow an attacker to obtain sensitive information that may aid in further attacks. Moodle 3.3, 3.2 through 3.2.3, 3.1 through 3.1.6 and prior versions are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-2652.title: Jenkins Distributed Fork Plugin CVE-2017-2652 Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2017-2652.body: Distributed Fork Plugin for Jenkins is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to bypass certain security restrictions to perform unauthorized actions. Failed exploit attempts will likely cause a denial-of-service condition. This issue is fixed in: Distributed Fork Plugin version 1.6.0

CVE-2017-2685.title: Multiple Siemens Products CVE-2017-2685 Man in the Middle Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2017-2685.body: Multiple Siemens Products are prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue may allow attackers to bypass certain security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions by conducting a man-in-the-middle attack. This may lead to other attacks.

CVE-2017-2693.title: Huawei EMUI Directory Traversal and Command Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2017-2693.body: Huawei EMUI is prone to a directory-traversal vulnerability and a command-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. Attackers can use a specially crafted request with directory-traversal sequences ('../') to decompress malicious files into the target path, or execute arbitrary commands and gain elevated privileges.

CVE-2017-2698.title: Huawei Smart Phones CVE-2017-2698 Local Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2017-2698.body: Huawei Smart Phones is prone to a local buffer-overflow vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to crash the affected application; denying service to legitimate or execute arbitrary code. Versions of Huawei Smart Phones 5.41 and prior are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-2711.title: Huawei P9 Plus CVE-2017-2711 Local Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2017-2711.body: Huawei P9 Plus is prone to a local denial-of-service vulnerability. A local attacker can exploit this issue to cause a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2017-2724.title: Huawei Smart Phones Multiple Local Buffer Overflow Vulnerabilities
CVE-2017-2724.body: Huawei Smart Phones are prone to multiple local buffer-overflow vulnerabilities because it fails to adequate boundary checks on user-supplied input. Local attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2017-2725.title: Huawei Smart Phones Multiple Local Buffer Overflow Vulnerabilities
CVE-2017-2725.body: Huawei Smart Phones are prone to multiple local buffer-overflow vulnerabilities because it fails to adequate boundary checks on user-supplied input. Local attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2017-2726.title: Huawei Smart Phones Multiple Local Buffer Overflow Vulnerabilities
CVE-2017-2726.body: Huawei Smart Phones are prone to multiple local buffer-overflow vulnerabilities because it fails to adequate boundary checks on user-supplied input. Local attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2017-2729.body: Huawei Honor 5A Smart Phone is prone to a local buffer-overflow vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to crash the affected application; denying service to legitimate or execute arbitrary code.

CVE-2017-2738.body: Huawei VCM5010 is prone to following security vulnerabilities: 1. A remote command injection vulnerability 2. An arbitrary file upload vulnerability 3. An authentication bypass vulnerability Attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary commands, upload arbitrary files, or bypass the authentication mechanism and perform unauthorized actions. Other attacks may also be possible. Versions prior to VCM5010 V100R002C50SPC100 are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-2750.body: Multiple HP products are prone to remote code execution vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue allows attackers to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application.

CVE-2017-2765.title: EMC Isilon InsightIQ CVE-2017-2765 Authentication Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2017-2765.body: EMC Isilon InsightIQ is prone to an authentication-bypass vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to bypass authentication mechanism and perform unauthorized actions. CVE-2017-2773.body: Pivotal Cloud Foundry Elastic Runtime is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to bypass security restrictions to perform unauthorized actions; this may aid in launching further attacks. The following versions are vulnerable: Pivotal Cloud Foundry Elastic Runtime versions prior to 1.6.60 Pivotal Cloud Foundry Elastic Runtime versions prior to 1.7.41 Pivotal Cloud Foundry Elastic Runtime versions prior to 1.8.23 Pivotal Cloud Foundry Elastic Runtime versions prior to 1.9.1

CVE-2017-2968.title: Adobe Campaign CVE-2017-2968 Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2017-2968.body: Adobe Campaign is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to bypass security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions; other attacks are also possible. Adobe Campaign 16.4 Build 8724 and prior versions are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-2969.body: Adobe Campaign is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary script code in the context of the affected website. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks. Adobe Campaign 16.4 Build 8724 and prior versions are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-2970.title: Adobe Acrobat and Reader APSB17-01 Multiple Heap Buffer Overflow Vulnerabilities
CVE-2017-2970.body: Adobe Acrobat and Reader are prone to multiple heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerabilities. Attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code within the context of the application. Failed attempts will likely cause a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2017-2972.title: Adobe Acrobat and Reader APSB17-01 Multiple Heap Buffer Overflow Vulnerabilities
CVE-2017-2972.body: Adobe Acrobat and Reader are prone to multiple heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerabilities. Attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code within the context of the application. Failed attempts will likely cause a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2017-3009.body: Adobe Acrobat and Reader are prone to an unspecified buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to properly bounds-check user-supplied data before copying it into an insufficiently sized buffer. An attacker may exploit this issue to cause a denial-of-service condition or gain sensitive information.

CVE-2017-3010.body: Adobe Acrobat and Reader are prone to an unspecified memory-corruption vulnerability. CVE-2017-3125.title: Fortinet FortiMail CVE-2017-3125 Unspecified Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2017-3125.body: Fortinet FortiMail is prone to a unspecified cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Fortinet FortiMail 5.0.0 through 5.2.9 and 5.3.0 through 5.3.8 are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-3129.title: Fortinet Fortiweb CVE-2017-3129 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2017-3129.body: Fortinet Fortiweb is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Fortinet Fortiweb versions prior to 5.7.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-3150.body: Apache Atlas is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to sanitize user-supplied input. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Apache Atlas 0.6.0-incubating and 0.7.0-incubating are affected; other versions may also be affected.

Successful exploits will allow attacker-supplied HTML and script code to run in the context of the affected browser, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or to control how the site is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible. Apache Atlas 0.6.0 and 0.7.0 are affected; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2017-3152.body: Apache Atlas is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to sanitize user-supplied input. CVE-2017-5874.title: D-Link DIR-600M CVE-2017-5874 Cross Site Request Forgery Vulnerability
CVE-2017-5874.body: D-Link DIR-600M is prone to a cross-site request-forgery vulnerability. Exploiting this issue may allow a remote attacker to perform certain unauthorized actions and gain access to the affected device. Other attacks are also possible.

CVE-2017-5882.title: SanaCMS CVE-2017-5882 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2017-5882.body: SanaCMS is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may help the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. SanaCMS 7.3 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2017-5885.title: gtk-vnc Remote Code Execution Vulnerability and Multiple Integer Overflow Vulnerabilities
CVE-2017-5885.body: gtk-vnc is prone to remote code-execution vulnerability and multiple integer overflow vulnerabilities. An attacker can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code within the context of the application. Failed exploit attempts will likely cause a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2017-5886.title: podofo CVE-2017-5886 Heap Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2017-5886.body: podofo is prone to a heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to adequately bounds-check user-supplied data before copying it into an insufficiently sized buffer. An attacker can exploit this issue to cause denial-of-service condition. Due to the nature of this issue, arbitrary code execution may be possible but this has not been confirmed. podofo 0.9.4 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2017-5899.title: S-nail CVE-2017-5899 Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2017-5899.body: S-nail is prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability. A local attacker can exploit this issue to gain root privileges.

An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may help the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. SanaCMS 7.3 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2017-6526.title: dnaLIMS Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2017-6526.body: dnaLIMS is prone to the following security vulnerabilities: 1. A command-injection vulnerability 2. An directory-traversal vulnerability 3. An insecure password storage vulnerability 4. A session-hijacking vulnerability 5. Multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities 6. A security-bypass vulnerability An attacker can exploit these issues to bypass certain security restrictions to perform unauthorized actions, bypass-authentication mechanism, gain access to potentially sensitive information, steal cookie-based authentication credentials, or execute arbitrary commands in the context of the affected application. This may lead to further attacks.

CVE-2017-7262.body: AMD Ryzen Processor is prone to a local denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to cause a denial-of-service condition, denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2017-7263.title: Potrace CVE-2017-7263 Incomplete Fix Heap Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2017-7263.body: Potrace is prone to a heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue crash the affected application, resulting in denial-of-service condition. This may lead to other attacks. Potrace 1.14 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected. Note: This issue is the result of an incomplete fix for CVE-2016-8698 described in BID 93778 (Potrace Multiple Security Vulnerabilities).

CVE-2017-7288.title: Zimbra Collaboration Suite CVE-2017-7288 Unspecified HTML Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2017-7288.body: Zimbra Collaboration Suite is prone to an unspecified HTML-injection vulnerability. Successful exploits will allow attacker-supplied HTML and script code to run in the context of the affected browser, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or to control how the site is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible. Versions prior to Zimbra Collaboration Suite 8.7.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-7290.title: XOOPS CVE-2017-7290 SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2017-7290.body: XOOPS is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query. Exploiting this issue could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database.

CVE-2017-7296.body: Contiki is prone to an HTML-injection vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. CVE-2017-7678.title: Apache Spark CVE-2017-7678 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2017-7678.body: Apache Spark is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Versions prior to Apache Spark 2.2.0 are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-7686.title: Apache Ignite CVE-2017-7686 Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2017-7686.body: Apache Ignite is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to gain access to sensitive information that may lead to further attacks. Apache Ignite 1.0.0-RC3 through 2.0 are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-7691.title: SAP NetWeaver TREX and BWA Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2017-7691.body: SAP NetWeaver TREX and BWA are prone to a vulnerability that lets attackers inject and execute arbitrary code. Successful exploits may allow an attacker to inject and run arbitrary code or obtain sensitive information that may aid in further attacks. Failed exploit attempts may result in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2017-7717.title: SAP NetWeaver AS JAVA 'getUserUddiElements' SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2017-7717.body: SAP NetWeaver is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query. An attacker can exploit this issue to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database. SAP NetWeaver 7.40 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2017-7717.title: SAP Customer Relationship Management (CRM) WebClient User Interface SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2017-7717.body: SAP Customer Relationship Management (CRM) is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query. An attacker can exploit this issue to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database.

CVE-2017-7719.title: WordPress Spider Event Calendar Plugin CVE-2017-7719 Multiple SQL Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2017-7719.body: The Spider Event Calendar plugin for WordPress is prone to multiple SQL-injection vulnerabilities because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query. Exploiting these issues could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database. Versions prior to Spider Event Calendar 1.5.52 are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-7725.title: Concrete5 CVE-2017-7725 HTML Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2017-7725.body: Concrete5 is prone to an HTML-injection vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. Successful exploits will allow attacker-supplied HTML and script code to run in the context of the affected browser, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or to control how the site is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible. Concrete5 8.1.0 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2017-7736.title: Fortinet Fortiweb CVE-2017-7736  HTML Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2017-7736.body: Fortinet Fortiweb is prone to an HTML-injection vulnerability because they fail to sanitize user-supplied input Successful exploits will allow attacker-supplied HTML and script code to run in the context of the affected site, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or control how the site is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible. Fortinet Fortiweb versions prior to 5.8.1 and 5.7.2 are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-7737.title: Fortinet Fortiweb CVE-2017-7737 Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2017-7737.body: Fortinet Fortiweb is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information that may aid in further attacks. Fortinet Fortiweb 5.8.2 and prior versions are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-7738.title: Fortinet FortiOS CVE-2017-7738 Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2017-7738.body: Fortinet FortiOS is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information that may aid in further attacks. The following versions are vulnerable:FortiOS 5.6.0 through 5.6.2 FortiOS 5.4.0 through 5.4.5 FortiOS 5.2 and prior

CVE-2017-7747.title: Wireshark 'dissectors/packet-packetbb.c' Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2017-7747.body: Wireshark is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability because it fails to properly handle certain types of packets. Attackers can exploit this issue to crash the affected application, resulting in denial-of-service conditions. Wireshark 2.2.0 through 2.2.5 and 2.0.0 through 2.0.11 are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-7859.title: FFmpeg CVE-2017-7859 Heap Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2017-7859.body: FFmpeg is prone to a heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely cause a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2017-7869.title: GnuTLS GNUTLS-SA-2017-3 Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2017-7869.body: GnuTLS is prone to multiple security vulnerabilities. Successful exploits may allow attackers to execute arbitrary code, disclose sensitive information or cause denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2017-7896.title: Trend Micro InterScan Messaging Security Virtual Appliance Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2017-7896.body: Trend Micro InterScan Messaging Security Virtual Appliance is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks. InterScan Messaging Security Virtual Appliance 9.1 is vulnerable.

CVE-2017-7944.title: XOOPS CVE-2017-7944 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2017-7944.body: XOOPS is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may let the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. XOOPS Core 2.5.8.1 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2017-7950.title: Nitro Pro CVE-2017-7950 Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2017-7950.body: Nitro Pro is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to crash the application, resulting in a denial-of-service condition. Nitro Pro 11.0.3.134 and prior are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-7965.title: Schneider Electric SoMachine HVAC Local Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2017-7965.body: Schneider Electric SoMachine HVAC is prone to a local buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied data. Successful exploits may allow attackers to execute arbitrary code in context of the application. Failed exploits may result in denial-of-service conditions. Schneider Electric SoMachine HVAC 2.1.0 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2017-7967.title: Schneider Electric VAMPSET Local Memory Corruption Vulnerability
CVE-2017-7967.body: Schneider Electric VAMPSET is prone to a local memory-corruption vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely cause denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2017-7969.title: Schneider Electric PowerSCADA Anywhere and Citect Anywhere Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2017-7969.body: Schneider Electric PowerSCADA Anywhere and Citect Anywhere are prone to the following security vulnerabilities: 1. A cross-site request-forgery vulnerability 2. An information-disclosure vulnerability 3. Multiple security-bypass vulnerabilities Exploiting these issues could allow an attacker to obtain sensitive information, bypass certain security restrictions, perform unauthorized actions, or gain access to the affected system. Following products and versions are vulnerable: PowerSCADA Anywhere 1.0 redistributed with PowerSCADA Expert 8.1 and PowerSCADA Expert 8.2 Citect Anywhere 1.0

CVE-2017-7973.title: Schneider Electric U.motion Builder Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2017-7973.body: Schneider Electric U.motion Builder is prone to the following multiple security vulnerabilities: 1. An SQL-injection vulnerability 2. A directory-traversal vulnerability 3. An authentication bypass vulnerability 4. An information-disclosure vulnerability 5. A local code-execution vulnerability 6. A local denial-of-Service vulnerability 7. An information-disclosure vulnerability Exploiting these issues could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database, bypass authentication mechanism, obtain sensitive information, execute arbitrary code and perform unauthorized actions. Failed exploits can result in a denial-of-service condition. Schneider Electric U.motion Builder 1.2.1 and prior versions are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-7974.title: Schneider Electric U.motion Builder Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2017-7974.body: Schneider Electric U.motion Builder is prone to the following multiple security vulnerabilities: 1. An SQL-injection vulnerability 2. A directory-traversal vulnerability 3. Failed exploits can result in a denial-of-service condition. Schneider Electric U.motion Builder 1.2.1 and prior versions are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-7979.title: Linux Kernel CVE-2017-7979 Local Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2017-7979.body: The Linux Kernel is prone to a local denial-of-service vulnerability. A local attacker can exploit this issue to cause a denial-of-service condition. Linux Kernel 4.11.0 through 4.11-rc7 are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-7983.title: Joomla! CVE-2017-7983 Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2017-7983.body: Joomla! is prone to a remote information-disclosure vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to gain access to sensitive information that may aid in further attacks. Joomla! versions 1.5.0 through 3.6.5 are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-7984.body: Joomla! is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Joomla! 3.2.0 through 3.6.5 are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-7986.body: Joomla! is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to sanitize user-supplied input. CVE-2017-7995.title: Xen CVE-2017-7995 Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2017-7995.body: Xen is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information that may aid in launching further attacks. Versions prior to Xen 4.3 are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-8015.title: EMC AppSync CVE-2017-8015 SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2017-8015.body: EMC AppSync is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query. Exploiting this issue could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database. EMC AppSync versions prior to 3.5 are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-8018.title: EMC AppSync Host Plug-in CVE-2017-8018 Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2017-8018.body: EMC AppSync Host Plug-in is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Remote attackers may exploit this issue to cause denial-of-service conditions, denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2017-8019.title: EMC ScaleIO CVE-2017-8019 Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2017-8019.body: EMC ScaleIO is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Remote attackers may exploit this issue to cause denial-of-service conditions, denying service to legitimate users. EMC ScaleIO 2.0.1.0 prior to 2.0.1.4 are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-8020.title: EMC ScaleIO CVE-2017-8020 Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2017-8020.body: EMC ScaleIO is prone to a buffer-overflow vulnerability because the application fails to bounds-check user-supplied data before copying it into an insufficiently sized buffer. Attackers can execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition. EMC ScaleIO 2.0.1.x prior to 2.0.1.4 are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-8023.title: Dell EMC NetWorker CVE-2017-8023 Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2017-8023.body: Dell EMC NetWorker is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition. The following products are affected:Dell EMC NetWorker versions 8.2.xDell EMC NetWorker versions 9.0.xDell EMC NetWorker versions prior to 9.1.1.5Dell EMC NetWorker versions prior to 9.2.1

CVE-2017-8037.title: Cloud Foundry Cloud Controller API CVE-2017-8037 Incomplete Fix Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2017-8037.body: Cloud Foundry Cloud Controller API is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to gain access to sensitive information that may aid in further attacks. CAPI-release 1.7.0 through 1.37.0 and cf-release 245 through 269 are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-8041.title: Pivotal Single Sign-On for PCF CVE-2017-8041 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2017-8041.body: Pivotal Single Sign-On for PCF is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. The following products are affected: Single Sign-On for PCF 1.3.x versions prior to 1.3.4. Single Sign-On for PCF 1.4.x versions prior to 1.4.3.

CVE-2017-8046.title: Multiple Pivotal Products CVE-2017-8046 Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2017-8046.body: Multiple Pivotal Products are prone to remote code-execution vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue allows attackers to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application. Failed exploits will result in denial-of-service conditions. The following products are vulnerable: Versions prior to Spring Data REST 2.5.12, 2.6.7, and 3.0 RC3 Versions prior to Spring Boot 2.0.0M4 Versions prior to Spring Data release trains prior to Kay-RC3

CVE-2017-8057.title: Joomla! CVE-2017-8057 Multiple Full Path Information Disclosure Vulnerabilities
CVE-2017-8057.body: Joomla! is prone to multiple information-disclosure vulnerabilities. Remote attackers can exploit these issues to obtain sensitive information that may lead to further attacks. Joomla! 3.4.0 through 3.6.5 are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-8078.title: TP-Link TL-SG108E CVE-2017-8078 Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2017-8078.body: TP-Link TL-SG108E is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. An attacker may leverage this issue to bypass certain security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions like unauthenticated remote upgrades. TP-Link TL-SG108E 1.1.2 Build 20141017 Rel.50749 firmware is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2017-8100.title: WordPress CopySafe Web Protection Plugin CVE-2017-8100 Cross Site Request Forgery Vulnerability
CVE-2017-8100.body: The CopySafe Web Protection Plugin for WordPress is prone to a cross-site request-forgery vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to perform certain unauthorized actions and gain access to the affected application. Other attacks are also possible. Versions prior to CopySafe Web Protection 2.6 are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-8104.title: MyBB CVE-2017-8104 Directory Traversal Vulnerability
CVE-2017-8104.body: MyBB is prone to a directory-traversal vulnerability because the application fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker can exploit this issue using directory-traversal characters ('../') to access or read arbitrary files that contain sensitive information or to access files outside of the restricted directory to obtain sensitive information and perform other attacks. Versions prior to MyBB 1.8.11 are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-8122.title: Huawei UMA CVE-2017-8122 Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2017-8122.body: Huawei Unified Maintenance Audit (UMA) system is prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability. Local attackers may exploit this issue to gain elevated privileges.

CVE-2017-8143.title: Huawei Smart Phones CVE-2017-8143 Local Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2017-8143.body: Huawei Smart Phones are prone to local denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to crash the system, resulting in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2017-8179.title: Huawei Smart Phones CVE-2017-8179 Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2017-8179.body: Huawei Smart Phones are prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability. Local attackers may exploit this issue to gain elevated privileges. Versions prior to Nice AL00C00B155 are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-8194.body: Huawei FusionSphere OpenStack is prone to an authentication-bypass vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to bypass the authentication mechanism.

CVE-2017-9052.body: Libdwarf is prone to a local heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability because it fails to properly bounds check user-supplied data before copying it into an insufficiently sized buffer. CVE-2017-0869.title: Google Android NVIDIA Components CVE-2017-0869 Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2017-0869.body: Google Android is prone to a privilege escalation vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of a privileged process. This issue is being tracked by Android Bug ID A-37776156.

CVE-2017-0899.title: RubyGems CVE-2017-0899 Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2017-0899.body: RubyGems is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. Successful exploits may allow attackers to bypass security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions. RubyGems version 2.6.12 and prior versions are affected.

CVE-2017-0900.title: RubyGems CVE-2017-0900 Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2017-0900.body: RubyGems is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to cause denial-of-service conditions. RubyGems version 2.6.12 and prior versions are affected.

CVE-2017-0901.title: RubyGems CVE-2017-0901 Local Arbitrary File Overwrite Vulnerability
CVE-2017-0901.body: RubyGems is prone to a local arbitrary file-overwrite vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied data. Attackers can overwrite arbitrary files on an unsuspecting user's computer in the context of the vulnerable application. Due to the nature of this issue, arbitrary code-execution may be possible. RubyGems version 2.6.12 and prior versions are affected.

CVE-2017-1000050.title: JasPer 'jpc_dec.c' Null Pointer Dereference Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2017-1000050.body: JasPer is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to crash the application, resulting in a denial-of-service condition. JasPer 2.0.12 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2017-1000071.title: phpCAS CVE-2017-1000071 Authentication Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2017-1000071.body: phpCAS is prone to a authentication-bypass vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to bypass authentication mechanism and perform unauthorized actions. This may lead to further attacks. phpCAS 1.3.4 is vulnerable; prior versions may also be affected.

CVE-2017-1000082.title: systemd CVE-2017-1000082 Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2017-1000082.body: systemd is prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability. Local attackers can exploit this issue to gain root privileges. systemd 233 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2017-1000099.title: Curl CVE-2017-1000099 Local Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2017-1000099.body: Curl is prone to a local information-disclosure vulnerability. A local attacker can leverage this issue to disclose sensitive information that may aid in further attacks. Curl 7.54.1 is vulnerable.

CVE-2017-1000100.title: cURL/libcURL CVE-2017-1000100 Heap Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2017-1000100.body: cURL/libcURL is prone to a heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result in denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2017-1000101.title: cURL CVE-2017-1000101 Out of Bounds Read Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2017-1000101.body: cURL is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information that may aid in launching further attacks. cURL 7.34.0 through 7.54.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-1000111.title: Linux Kernel CVE-2017-1000111 Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2017-1000111.body: Linux kernel is prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability. Local attackers may exploit this issue to gain elevated privileges.

CVE-2017-1000116.title: Mercurial Remote Command Injection and Symlink Directory Traversal Vulnerabilities
CVE-2017-1000116.body: Mercurial is prone to a remote command-injection vulnerability and a directory-traversal vulnerability. An attacker may exploit this issue to inject and execute arbitrary commands within the context of the affected application or gain write access to the files outside of the restricted directory; this may aid in further attacks.

CVE-2017-1000188.title: Node.js ejs Package 'ejs.renderFile()' function Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2017-1000188.body: The ejs Package for Node.js is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch code injection attacks. Versions prior to ejs 2.5.5 are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-1000189.title: Node.js ejs Package 'ejs.renderFile()' function Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2017-1000189.body: The ejs Package for Node.js is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability Remote attackers can exploit this issue to cause denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2017-1000254.body: Curl is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker may exploit this issue to cause a denial-of-service condition. Curl/Libcurl versions 7.7 through 7.55.1 are vulnerable.https://curl.haxx.se/docs/vuln-7.55.1.html

CVE-2017-1000257.body: cURL/libcURL is prone to a buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to adequately bounds-check user-supplied data before copying it into an insufficiently sized buffer. CVE-2017-1000363.body: Linux Kernel is prone to a remote integer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied data. Attackers may exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application. Failed exploits may result in denial-of-service conditions. The following products are affected: Linux 4.x (4.12-rc1 and prior) Linux 3.x Linux 2.6.x Linux 2.4.x Linux 2.2.x

CVE-2017-10679.title: Piwigo CVE-2017-10679 Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2017-10679.body: Piwigo is prone to an information disclosure vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information; information obtained may aid in other attacks.
