CVE-2017-10680.body: Piwigo is prone to a cross-site request-forgery vulnerability. Exploiting this issue may allow a remote attacker to perform certain unauthorized actions in the context of the affected application. Other attacks are also possible. Piwigo 2.9.1 and prior versions are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-10681.title: Piwigo CVE-2017-10681 Cross-Site Request Forgery Vulnerability
CVE-2017-10681.body: Piwigo is prone to a cross-site request-forgery vulnerability. Exploiting this issue may allow a remote attacker to perform certain unauthorized actions in the context of the affected application. Other attacks are also possible. Piwigo 2.9.1 and prior versions are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-10682.title: Piwigo 'cat_options.php' Multiple SQL Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2017-10682.body: Piwigo is prone to multiple SQL-injection vulnerabilities because the application fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input before using it in an SQL query. An attacker can leverage these issues to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database. Piwigo 2.9.1 and prior versions are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-10688.title: LibTIFF 'tif_dirwrite.c' Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2017-10688.body: LibTIFF is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to cause denial-of-service conditions. LibTIFF 4.0.8 is vulnerable; other versions may also be vulnerable.

CVE-2017-10784.body: Ruby is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. Successful exploits may allow attackers to bypass security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions. The following versions are affected: Ruby 2.2.7 and prior versions are affected. Ruby 2.3.4 and prior versions are affected. Ruby 2.4.1 and prior versions are affected.

CVE-2017-10788.title: Perl DBD::mysql Module CVE-2017-10788 Use After Free Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2017-10788.body: The DBD::mysql module for Perl is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue allows remote attackers to crash the affected application, denying service to legitimate users. Due to the nature of this issue, code execution may be possible but this has not been confirmed. DBD::mysql versions through 4.043 are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-10792.title: GNU PSPP CVE-2017-10792 NULL Pointer Dereference Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2017-10792.body: GNU PSPP is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to crash the application, resulting in a denial-of-service condition. GNU PSPP 0.10.5-pre2 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2017-10794.title: GraphicsMagick CVE-2017-10794 Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2017-10794.body: GraphicsMagick is prone to a buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied data. A remote attacker may exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application. Failed attempts will likely cause a denial-of-service condition. GraphicsMagick 1.3.25 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2017-10795.title: Subrion CMS CVE-2017-10795 HTML Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2017-10795.body: Subrion CMS is prone to an HTML-injection vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. Other attacks are also possible. Subrion CMS 4.1.4 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

Attackers can exploit this issue to crash the QEMU instance, resulting in a denial-of-service condition. Due to the nature of this issue, code execution may be possible but this has not been confirmed.

CVE-2017-10928.body: ImageMagick is prone to a heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to adequately bounds-check user-supplied data before copying it into an insufficiently sized buffer. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application. Failed exploits may result in denial-of-service condition. ImageMagick 7.0.6-0 is vulnerable; other versions may be affected.

CVE-2017-10929.title: radare2 CVE-2017-10929 Heap Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2017-10929.body: radare2 is prone to a heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability . An attacker can exploit this issue to crash the affected application, resulting in denial-of-service conditions. Due to the nature of this issue, arbitrary code execution may be possible but this has not been confirmed. radare2 1.5.0 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2017-10951.title: Foxit Reader CVE-2017-10951 Remote Command Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2017-10951.body: Foxit Reader is prone to a remote command-injection vulnerability. An attacker may exploit this issue to inject and execute arbitrary commands within the context of the affected application; this may aid in further attacks.

CVE-2017-10952.title: Foxit Reader CVE-2017-10952 Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2017-10952.body: Foxit Reader is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely cause a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2017-1096.title: IBM Jazz Reporting Service Multiple Cross Site Scripting and Information Disclosure Vulnerabilities
CVE-2017-1096.body: IBM Jazz Reporting Service is prone to multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities and an information disclosure vulnerability. An attacker may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This can allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or gain access to sensitive information. Jazz Reporting Service 5.0, 5.0.1, 5.0.2, 6.0, 6.0.1, 6.0.2, and 6.0.3 are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-10971.title: X.Org X Server CVE-2017-10971 Stack Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2017-10971.body: X.Org X Server is prone to a stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied data. A remote attacker may exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application. Failed attempts will likely cause a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2017-11605.body: LibSass is prone to a heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to cause denial-of-service condition. CVE-2017-11613.title: LibTIFF 'TIFFOpen()' Function Denial of Service Vulnerability

CVE-2017-11628.title: PHP 'zend_ini_do_op()' Function Stack Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2017-11628.body: PHP is prone to a remote stack-based buffer-overflow because it fails to adequately bounds-check user-supplied data before copying it into an insufficiently sized buffer. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely cause a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2017-11636.title: GraphicsMagick CVE-2017-11636 Heap Buffer Overflow Vulnerability

Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result in denial-of-service conditions. CVE-2017-1164.title: IBM Jazz Foundation CVE-2017-1164 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2017-1164.body: IBM Jazz Foundation is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. Successful exploits will result in the execution of arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This can allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks.

An attacker can exploit this issue to write arbitrary contents to a file on the samba share or to a shared printer, which may aid in further attacks. CVE-2017-12302.title: Cisco Unified Communications Manager CVE-2017-12302 SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2017-12302.body: Cisco Unified Communications Manager is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query. Exploiting this issue could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database. This issue being tracked by Cisco Bug ID CSCvf36682.

CVE-2017-12304.title: Cisco IOS and IOS XE Software CVE-2017-12304 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2017-12304.body: Cisco IOS and IOS XE Software are prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because they fail to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This can allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. This issue is being tracked by Cisco Bug ID CSCvf60862.

CVE-2017-12305.title: Cisco IP Phone 8800 Series CVE-2017-12305 Local Command Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2017-12305.body: Cisco IP Phone 8800 Series are prone to a local command-injection vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may exploit this issue to inject and execute arbitrary commands within the context of the affected application; this may aid in further attacks. . This issue is being tracked by Cisco bug ID CSCvf80034.

CVE-2017-12311.title: Cisco Meeting Server H.264 Decoding CVE-2017-12311 Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2017-12311.body: Cisco Meeting Server is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to reload the affected process, denying service to legitimate users.This issue is being tracked by Cisco Bug ID CSCvg12559.

CVE-2017-12328.title: Cisco IP Phone 8800 Series CVE-2017-12328 Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2017-12328.body: Cisco IP Phone 8800 Series are prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. A remote attacker may exploit this issue to cause a denial-of-service condition; denying service to legitimate users. This issue is tracked by Cisco Bug ID CSCvc62590.

CVE-2017-12334.title: Cisco NX-OS System Software CVE-2017-12334 Local Command Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2017-12334.body: Cisco NX-OS System Software is prone to a local command-injection vulnerability. A local attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary commands with root privileges. This issue being tracked by Cisco Bug IDs CSCvf15113, CSCvf15122, CSCvf15125, CSCvf15131, CSCvf15143 and CSCvg04088.

CVE-2017-12336.title: Cisco NX-OS System Software CVE-2017-12336 Local Unauthorized Access Vulnerability
CVE-2017-12336.body: Cisco NX-OS System Software is prone to a unauthorized access vulnerability. A local attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary commands with user privileges in context of the affected application.This issue is being tracked by Cisco Bug ID's CSCve93750, CSCve93762, CSCve93763 and CSCvg04127.

CVE-2017-12337.title: Cisco Voice OS CVE-2017-12337 Unauthorized Access Vulnerability
CVE-2017-12337.body: Cisco Voice OS is prone to a unauthorized access vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to bypass the security mechanism and gain unauthorized access. CVE-2017-1234.title: IBM QRadar CVE-2017-1234 HTML Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2017-1234.body: IBM QRadar is prone to an HTML-injection vulnerability. Successful exploits will result in the execution of arbitrary attacker-supplied HTML and script code in the context of the affected application, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or control how the page is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible.

CVE-2017-12348.title: Cisco UCS Central Software Cross Site Scripting and Session Fixation Vulnerabilities
CVE-2017-12348.body: Cisco UCS Central Software is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability and a session-fixation vulnerability. An attacker may leverage these issues to hijack an arbitrary session and gain unauthorized access to the affected application or to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. These issues are being tracked by Cisco Bug ID CSCvf71978 and CSCvf71986.

CVE-2017-12544.body: HP System Management Homepage is prone to the following security vulnerabilities. 1. A Cross-site scripting Vulnerability 2. A Denial-of-service vulnerability 3. A buffer overflow vulnerability 4. A command injection vulnerability 5. An authentication bypass vulnerability 6 .A security-bypass vulnerability Attackers can exploit these issues to steal cookie-based authentication credentials, to execute arbitrary scripts in the context of the web server process, or to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application and to bypass certain security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions. Failed attacks may cause a denial of service condition. This may aid in launching further attacks. Versions prior to System Management Homepage Software 7.6.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-1258.body: IBM Security Guardium is prone to a authentication-bypass vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to bypass authentication mechanism and perform unauthorized actions. This may lead to further attacks. IBM Security Guardium 10.0, 10.0.1, 10.1 and 10.1.2 are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-12607.body: Apache OpenOffice is prone to multiple remote code-execution vulnerabilities. Attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely cause a denial-of-service condition. Apache OpenOffice 4.1.3 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2017-12613.body: Apache Portable Runtime Utility is prone to multiple information-disclosure vulnerabilities. An attacker can exploit these issues to obtain sensitive information that may aid in further attacks. Failed exploit attempts will result in denial-of-service conditions. Apache Portable Runtime Utility (APR-util) 1.6.2 and prior versions are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-12616.title: Apache Tomcat CVE-2017-12616 Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2017-12616.body: Apache Tomcat is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information that may aid in further attacks. Apache Tomcat 7.0.0 through 7.0.80 are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-12618.title: Apache Portable Runtime Utility Local Out-of-Bounds Read Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2017-12618.body: Apache Portable Runtime Utility is prone to a local denial-of-service vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue allows an attackers to crash the affected application, denying service to legitimate users. Apache Portable Runtime Utility (APR-util) 1.6.0 and prior versions are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-12631.title: Apache CXF Fediz CVE-2017-12631 Multiple Cross Site Request Forgery Vulnerabilities
CVE-2017-12631.body: Apache CXF Fediz is prone to multiple cross-site request-forgery vulnerabilities. Exploiting these issues may allow a remote attacker to perform certain unauthorized actions in the context of the affected application. Other attacks are also possible. Versions prior to Apache CXF Fediz 1.4.3 and 1.3.3 are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-1264.title: IBM Security Guardium CVE-2017-1264 Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2017-1264.body: IBM Security Guardium is prone to a remote information-disclosure vulnerability. Remote attackers can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information that may lead to further attacks. IBM Security Guardium 10.0, 10.0.1,10.1 and 10.1.2 are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-12640.title: ImageMagick CVE-2017-12640 Heap Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2017-12640.body: ImageMagick is prone to a heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to adequately bounds-check user-supplied data before copying it into an insufficiently sized buffer. An attacker can exploit this issue to cause denial-of-service condition. Due to the nature of this issue, code execution may be possible but this has not been confirmed. ImageMagick 7.0.6-1 is vulnerable; other versions may be affected.

CVE-2017-12652.title: libpng CVE-2017-12652 Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2017-12652.body: libpng is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to bypass certain security restrictions to perform unauthorized actions. This may aid in further attacks. Versions prior to libpng 1.6.32 are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-12676.title: ImageMagick CVE-2017-12676 Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2017-12676.body: ImageMagick is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to cause a denial-of-service condition. ImageMagick 7.0.6-3 and 6.9.9-3 are vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2017-1268.title: IBM Security Guardium CVE-2017-1268 Local Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2017-1268.body: IBM Security Guardium is prone to a local information-disclosure vulnerabilityA local attacker can exploit this issue to gain access to sensitive information; this may lead to further attacks.IBM Security Guardium version 10.0 through 10.5 are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-1269.title: IBM Security Guardium CVE-2017-1269 Unspecified SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2017-1269.body: IBM Security Guardium is prone to an unspecified SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data. A successful exploit may allow an attacker to access data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database. IBM Security Guardium versions 10.0, 10.0.1, 10.1, and 10.1.2 are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-12694.title: SpiderControl SCADA Web Server CVE-2017-12694 Directory Traversal Vulnerability
CVE-2017-12694.body: SpiderControl SCADA Web Server is prone to a directory-traversal vulnerability. Remote attackers can use specially crafted requests with directory-traversal sequences ('../') to read arbitrary files in the context of the application. This may aid in further attacks.

CVE-2017-12695.body: General Motors Shanghai OnStar is prone to multiple security vulnerabilities. An attackers may exploit these issues to gain unauthorized complete access to the affected application by bypassing intended security restrictions or perform man-in-the-middle attack to edit or view sensitive information that may aid in launching further attacks.Shanghai OnStar 7.1 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2017-12698.title: Advantech WebAccess ICSA-17-241-02 Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2017-12698.body: Advantech WebAccess is prone to the following security vulnerabilities: 1. Multiple stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerabilities 2. Multiple heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerabilities. 3. Multiple memory-corruption vulnerabilities. 4. An SQL-injection vulnerability. 5. A format-string vulnerability. 6. An authentication-bypass vulnerability. 7. A security-bypass vulnerability. 8. A privilege-escalation vulnerability. 9. A remote-code execution vulnerability. An attacker can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application, or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database,perform certain unauthorized actions, gain unauthorized access and gain elevated privileges. This may aid in further attacks. Advantech WebAccess versions prior to V8.2_20170817 are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-12731.title: Multiple OPW Products ICSA-17-243-04 SQL Injection and Authentication Bypass Vulnerabilities

CVE-2017-1274.title: RETIRED: IBM Domino CVE-2017-1274 Stack Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2017-1274.body: IBM Domino is prone to a stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because the application fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied input. CVE-2017-1274.title: IBM Domino CVE-2017-1274 Stack Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2017-1274.body: IBM Domino Server is prone to a stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability. CVE-2017-1276.title: IBM Rational DOORS Next Generation CVE-2017-1276 Unspecified Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2017-1276.body: IBM Rational DOORS Next Generation is prone to an unspecified cross-site scripting vulnerability because they fail to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in an unsuspecting user's browser in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks.

CVE-2017-12762.title: Linux kernel CVE-2017-12762 Local Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2017-12762.body: Linux Kernel is prone to a local buffer-overflow vulnerability. Successful exploits may allow attackers to execute arbitrary code in context of the application. Failed exploits may result in denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2017-1278.title: Multiple IBM Products CVE-2017-1278 HTML Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2017-1278.body: Multiple IBM Products are prone to an unspecified HTML-injection vulnerability. Successful exploits will allow attacker-supplied HTML and script code to run in the context of the affected browser, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or control how the site is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible. The following products are affected: IBM Rational DOORS Next Generation 6.0 through 6.0.3 IBM Rational Requirements Composer 5.0 through 5.0.2 IBM Rational Requirements Composer 4.0.1 through 4.0.7

CVE-2017-12791.title: SaltStack Salt CVE-2017-12791 Directory Traversal Vulnerability
CVE-2017-12791.body: SaltStack Salt is prone to a directory-traversal vulnerability. Remote attackers may use a specially crafted request with directory-traversal sequences ('../') to retrieve sensitive information. This may aid in further attacks. SaltStack Salt 2016.11.6 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2017-12794.title: Django CVE-2017-12794 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2017-12794.body: Django is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may help the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Django 1.11 through 1.11.4 and 1.10 through 1.10.7 are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-12799.title: GNU Binutils 'bfd/elf.c'  Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2017-12799.body: GNU Binutils is prone to a remote buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to adequately bounds-check user-supplied data before copying it to an insufficiently sized memory buffer. An attacker can exploit this issue to crash the affected application, resulting in denial-of-service conditions. Due to the nature of this issue, arbitrary code execution may be possible but this has not been confirmed. GNU Binutils 2.29 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2017-12809.title: Qemu CVE-2017-12809 Null Pointer Dereference Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2017-12809.body: Qemu is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to crash the application, resulting in a denial-of-service condition. Note: Quick emulator built with the IDE disk and CD/DVD-ROM Emulator support is vulnerable.

CVE-2017-12814.title: Perl CVE-2017-12814 Stack Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2017-12814.body: Perl is prone to a stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability because it fails to properly bounds-check user-supplied input. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the vulnerable application. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions. Perl prior to 5.24.3-RC1 and 5.26.x prior to 5.26.1-RC1 are vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2017-12818.title: Gemalto Sentinel License Manager Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2017-12818.body: Gemalto Sentinel License Manager is prone to the following security vulnerabilities: 1. Multiple stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerabilities. 2. Multiple heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerabilities.3. A security bypass vulnerability. 4. A denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application or perform unauthorized actions. Failed exploit attempts will likely cause a denial-of-service condition.The following Sentinel License Manger services are affected:Gemalto HASP SRMGemalto Sentinel HASPGemalto Sentinel LDK products prior to Sentinel LDK RTE 7.55

CVE-2017-12837.body: Perl is prone to a heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to properly bounds-check user-supplied input. CVE-2017-1284.title: IBM MQ CVE-2017-1284 Local Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2017-1284.body: IBM MQ is prone to a local information-disclosure vulnerability. Successful exploits may allow an attacker to obtain sensitive information that may lead to further attacks.

CVE-2017-1285.body: Multiple IBM Products are prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to cause denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2017-12855.body: Xen is prone to a local information-disclosure vulnerability. Local attackers with guest access can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information that may lead to further attacks. Xen 4.9, 4.8, 4.7, 4.6, and 4.5 are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-12865.title: connman 'src/dnsproxy.c' Stack Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2017-12865.body: connman is prone to a stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application. CVE-2017-12883.body: Perl is prone to a remote buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to properly bounds-check user-supplied input. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the vulnerable application. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2017-1290.title: IBM OpenPages GRC Platform CVE-2017-1290 Unspecified Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2017-1290.body: IBM OpenPages GRC Platform is prone to an unspecified cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks.IBM OpenPages versions 7.1 through 7.3 are vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2017-12927.title: Cacti 'spikekill.php' Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2017-12927.body: Cacti is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Cacti 1.1.17 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2017-12932.title: PHP 'ext/standard/var_unserializer.re' Heap Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2017-12932.body: PHP is prone to a heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability. Currently we don't have enough technical details to depict the effect. PHP 7.0.0 through 7.0.22 and 7.1.0 through 7.1.8 are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-12933.title: PHP 'finish_nested_data()' Function  Heap Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2017-12933.body: PHP is prone to a heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to adequately bounds-check user-supplied data before copying it into an insufficiently sized buffer. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result in denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2017-12934.title: PHP CVE-2017-12934 Heap Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2017-12934.body: PHP is prone to a heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability. Currently we don't have enough technical details to depict the effect. PHP 7.0.0 through 7.0.20 and 7.1.0 through 7.1.6 are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-12937.title: GraphicsMagick CVE-2017-12937 Heap Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2017-12937.body: GraphicsMagick is prone to a heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to adequately bounds-check user-supplied data before copying it into an insufficiently sized buffer. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result in denial-of-service conditions. GraphicsMagick 1.3.26 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2017-1295.title: IBM RSA DM CVE-2017-1295 Unspecified Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2017-1295.body: IBM RSA DM is prone to an unspecified information-disclosure vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to gain access to sensitive unspecified information; this may lead to further attacks.

CVE-2017-12967.title: GNU Binutils CVE-2017-12967 Remote Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2017-12967.body: GNU Binutils is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to crash the affected application, resulting in denial-of-service conditions. Due to the nature of this issue, arbitrary code execution may be possible but this has not been confirmed. GNU Binutils 2.29 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2017-1297.title: IBM DB2 CVE-2017-1297 Local Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2017-1297.body: IBM DB2 is prone to a local buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied data. Successful exploits may allow attackers to execute arbitrary code in context of the application. Failed exploits may result in denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2017-1300.title: IBM OpenPages GRC Platform CVE-2017-1300 Cross Site Request Forgery Vulnerability
CVE-2017-1300.body: IBM OpenPages GRC Platform is prone to a cross-site request forgery vulnerability because it fails to properly validate HTTP requests. Exploiting this issue may allow a remote attacker to perform certain unauthorized actions and gain access to the affected application. Other attacks are also possible.

CVE-2017-1302.title: IBM Sterling B2B Integrator CVE-2017-1302 Local Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2017-1302.body: IBM Sterling B2B Integrator is prone to a local information-disclosure vulnerability. Exploiting this issue may allow a local attacker to obtain sensitive information that may aid in further attacks. IBM Sterling B2B Integrator 5.2 is vulnerable.

CVE-2017-1303.title: IBM WebSphere Portal CVE-2017-1303 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2017-1303.body: IBM WebSphere Portal is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. IBM WebSphere Portal 9.0, 8.0, 7.0 and 8.5 are vulnerable.

An SQL-injection vulnerability An attacker can exploit these issues to steal cookie-based authentication credentials, to redirect a user to an attacker-controlled site; this may aid in phishing attacks , to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database.; and to read arbitrary files in the context of the application. WordPress versions 4.8.1 and earlier are affected.

Successfully exploiting this issue may allow attackers to bypass security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions by conducting a man-in-the-middle attack. This may lead to other attacks.

CVE-2017-15087.title: Samba CVE-2017-15087 Incomplete Fix Arbitrary File Write Vulnerability
CVE-2017-15087.body: Samba is prone to a vulnerability that lets attackers write or overwrite arbitrary files. An attacker can exploit this issue to write arbitrary contents to a file on the samba share or to a shared printer, which may aid in further attacks.

CVE-2017-15088.title: MIT krb5 CVE-2017-15088 Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerability

CVE-2017-15118.title: QEMU 'b/nbd/server.c' Stack Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2017-15118.body: QEMU is prone to a stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to adequately bounds-check user-supplied data before copying it to an insufficiently sized memory buffer. Attackers can exploit this issue to crash the QEMU instance, resulting in a denial-of-service condition. Due to the nature of this issue, code execution may be possible but this has not been confirmed.

CVE-2017-15124.title: QEMU CVE-2017-15124 Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2017-15124.body: QEMU is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to cause a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2017-15125.title: Red Hat CloudForms CVE-2017-15125 HTML Injection Vulnerability

This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks.

CVE-2017-1593.title: IBM Rational DOORS Next Generation Multiple Cross Site Scripting Vulnerabilities
CVE-2017-1593.body: IBM Rational DOORS Next Generation is prone to multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may let the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks.

CVE-2017-15930.title: GraphicsMagick CVE-2017-15930 Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2017-15930.body: GraphicsMagick is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to cause denial-of-service conditions. GraphicsMagick 1.3.26 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2017-15931.title: radare2 'libr/bin/format/elf/elf.c' Remote Denial Of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2017-15931.body: radare2 is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to crash the affected application, resulting in denial-of-service condition. radare2 2.0.1 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2017-15932.title: radare2 'libr/bin/format/elf/elf.c' Remote Denial Of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2017-15932.body: radare2 is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to crash the affected application, resulting in denial-of-service condition. radare2 2.0.1 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2017-15933.title: EyesOfNetwork CVE-2017-15933 SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2017-15933.body: EyesOfNetwork is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query. A successful exploit may allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database. EyesOfNetwork 5.1-0 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2017-15938.title: GNU Binutils CVE-2017-15938 Remote Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2017-15938.body: GNU Binutils is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to cause a denial-of-service condition. GNU Binutils 2.29 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2017-15939.title: GNU Binutils CVE-2017-15939 Incomplete Fix Remote Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2017-15939.body: GNU Binutils is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Note: This issue is the result of an incomplete fix for the issue described in BID 101611 (GNU Binutils CVE-2017-15023 Remote Denial of Service Vulnerability).An attacker can exploit this issue to cause a denial-of-service condition. GNU Binutils 2.29 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2017-15941.title: Palo Alto Networks PAN-OS CVE-2017-15941 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2017-15941.body: Palo Alto Networks PAN-OS is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may let the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. The following PAN-OS versions are affected:PAN-OS 6.1.18 and earlierPAN-OS 7.0.18 and earlierPAN-OS 7.1.13 and earlierPAN-OS 8.0.6-h3 and earlier

CVE-2017-15951.title: Linux kernel CVE-2017-15951 Local Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2017-15951.body: Linux kernel is prone to a local denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to cause a local denial-of-service condition. Versions prior to Linux kernel 4.13.10 are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-15996.title: GNU Binutils CVE-2017-15996 Multiple Denial of Service Vulnerabilities
CVE-2017-15996.body: GNU Binutils is prone to multiple denial-of-service vulnerabilities. An attacker can exploit these issues to cause a denial-of-service condition. GNU Binutils 2.29 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

GraphicsMagick 1.3.26 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2017-17498.body: GraphicsMagick is prone to a heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this vulnerability can allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application. Failed attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions. Versions prior to GraphicsMagick 1.3.26 are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-1750.title: IBM Jazz Reporting Service CVE-2017-1750 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2017-1750.body: IBM Jazz Reporting Service is prone to an unspecified cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. IBM Jazz Reporting Service 5.0, 5.0.1, 5.0.2, 6.0, 6.0.1, 6.0.2, 6.0.3, 6.0.4 and 6.0.5 are vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2017-17557.body: Foxit Reader and Foxit PhantomPDF are prone to a heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to adequately bounds-check user-supplied data before copying it to an insufficiently sized memory buffer. CVE-2017-2579.body: Netpbm is prone to a local denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to crash the affected application, resulting in denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2017-2580.title: Netpbm CVE-2017-2580 Local Heap Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2017-2580.body: Netpbm is prone to an local heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability because it fails to adequately bounds-check user-supplied data before copying it into an insufficiently sized buffer. A local attacker can leverage this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of affected application. Failed attempts may lead to denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2017-2581.body: Netpbm is prone to an local integer-overflow vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2017-2591.body: 389 Directory Server is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to crash the application, denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2017-2594.title: Hawtio CVE-2017-2594 Directory Traversal Vulnerability
CVE-2017-2594.body: Hawtio is prone to a directory-traversal vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this issue using directory-traversal characters ('../') to access arbitrary files that contain sensitive information. Information harvested may aid in launching further attacks.

CVE-2017-2595.title: Red Hat Wildfly CVE-2017-2595 Directory Traversal Vulnerability
CVE-2017-2595.body: Red Hat Wildfly is prone to a directory-traversal vulnerability because the application fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. Remote attackers may use a specially crafted request with directory-traversal sequences ('../') to retrieve sensitive information. This may aid in further attacks. Red Hat Wildfly 10.x.x versions are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-2600.title: Jenkins CVE-2017-2600 Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2017-2600.body: Jenkins is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to gain access to sensitive information that may aid in further attacks. The following versions are affected: Jenkins 2.43 and prior versions. Jenkins LTS 2.32.1 and prior versions.

CVE-2017-2601.title: Jenkins CVE-2017-2601 HTML Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2017-2601.body: Jenkins is prone to an HTML-injection vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. Successful exploits will allow attacker-supplied HTML and script code to run in the context of the affected browser, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or to control how the site is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible. The following versions are affected: Jenkins 2.43 and prior versions. Jenkins LTS 2.32.1 and prior versions

CVE-2017-2615.body: QEMU is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability.. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code with privileges of the Qemu process on the host. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2017-2624.body: X.org X Server is prone to the following multiple security vulnerabilities. 1. A local privilege-escalation vulnerability 2. A local use-after-free vulnerability 3. Failed exploit attempts will likely cause denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2017-2630.title: QEMU 'nbd/client.c' Stack Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2017-2630.body: QEMU is prone to a stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to adequately bounds-check user-supplied data before copying it to an insufficiently sized memory buffer. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the Qemu process. Failed exploit attempts will likely cause denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2017-2633.title: QEMU CVE-2017-2633 Denial of Service Vulnerability

CVE-2017-2638.body: infinispan is prone to an authentication-bypass vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to bypass the authentication mechanism and obtain sensitive information. This may aid in further attacks. Versions prior to infinispan 9.0.0.Final are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-2641.body: Moodle is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query. A successful exploit may allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database. This issue is fixed in: Moodle versions 3.2.2, 3.1.5, 3.0.9 and 2.7.19.

CVE-2017-2644.body: Moodle is prone to an HTML-injection vulnerability because it fails to sanitize user-supplied input. Successful exploits will allow attacker-supplied HTML and script code to run in the context of the affected site, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or control how the site is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible. Moodle 3.2 through 3.2.1 and 3.1 through 3.1.4 are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-2973.body: Adobe Digital Editions is prone to an unspecified heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because the application fails to properly bounds-check user-supplied data before copying it into an insufficiently sized buffer. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the user running the affected application. Failed attempts will likely cause a denial-of-service condition. Adobe Digital Editions 4.5.3 and prior versions are affected.

CVE-2017-3102.title: Adobe Connect CVE-2017-3102 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2017-3102.body: Adobe Connect is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary script code in the context of the affected website. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks. Adobe Connect 9.6.1 and prior versions are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-3103.title: Adobe Connect CVE-2017-3103 HTML Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2017-3103.body: Adobe Connect is prone to a HTML-injection vulnerability because it fails to sanitize user-supplied input. Successful exploits will allow attacker-supplied HTML and script code to run in the context of the affected site, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or control how the site is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible. Adobe Connect 9.6.1 and prior versions are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-4950.body: Multiple VMware Products are prone to an integer-overflow vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to cause a denial-of-service condition. Due to the nature of this issue, code execution may be possible but this has not been confirmed.

CVE-2017-4951.title: VMware AirWatch Console CVE-2017-4951 Cross Site Request Forgery Vulnerability
CVE-2017-4951.body: VMware AirWatch Console is prone to a cross-site request-forgery vulnerability. Exploiting this issue may allow a remote attacker to perform certain unauthorized actions and gain access to the affected application. Other attacks are also possible.

CVE-2017-4977.title: RSA Archer Security Operations Management with RSA UCF Local Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2017-4977.body: RSA Archer Security Operations Management with RSA Unified Collector Framework is prone to a local information-disclosure vulnerability. Local attackers can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information. Versions prior to RSA Archer Security Operations Management with RSA Unified Collector Framework 1.3.1.52 are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-4978.title: EMC RSA Adaptive Authentication (On Premise) CVE-2017-4978 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2017-4978.body: EMC RSA Adaptive Authentication (On Premise) is prone to an unspecified cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Versions prior to RSA Adaptive Authentication (On Premise) 7.3 P2 are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-4986.title: EMC Secure Remote Services Virtual Edition CVE-2017-4986 Authentication Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2017-4986.body: EMC Secure Remote Services Virtual Edition is prone to an authentication-bypass vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to bypass authentication mechanism and perform unauthorized actions. This may lead to further attacks. EMC Secure Remote Services Virtual Edition 3.18 and prior are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-4989.title: EMC Avamar Authentication Bypass And Arbitrary File Upload Vulnerabilities
CVE-2017-4989.body: EMC Avamar is prone to an authentication-bypass vulnerability and an arbitrary-file-upload vulnerability because it fails to adequately sanitize user-supplied input. Attackers can leverage these issues to bypass the authentication mechanism, gain unauthorized access and upload arbitrary files to the affected computer; this can result in arbitrary code execution within the context of the vulnerable application or privilege escalation. The following versions are affected: EMC Avamar 7.4.1-58, 7.4.0-242 for [CVE-2017-4990] EMC Avamar 7.3.1-125, 7.3.0-233, 7.3.0-226 for [CVE-2017-4989, CVE-2017-4990] EMC Avamar 7.2.1-32, 7.2.1-31, 7.2.0-401 for [CVE-2017-4989]

CVE-2017-4998.title: EMC RSA Archer GRC Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2017-4998.body: EMC RSA Archer GRC is prone to the following multiple security vulnerabilities: 1. A cross-site request-forgery vulnerability 2. A privilege-escalation vulnerability 3. An information-disclosure vulnerability 4. A cross-site scripting vulnerability 5. An open-redirection vulnerability Exploiting these issues will allow an attacker to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site, obtain sensitive information, carry out phishing attacks, and perform unauthorized actions with elevated privileges. RSA Archer GRC 5.5.1.3.1,5.5.2,5.5.2.3,5.5.3.1, and 5.4.1.3 are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-4999.title: EMC RSA Archer GRC Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2017-4999.body: EMC RSA Archer GRC is prone to the following multiple security vulnerabilities: 1. A cross-site request-forgery vulnerability 2. A privilege-escalation vulnerability 3. RSA Archer GRC 5.5.1.3.1,5.5.2,5.5.2.3,5.5.3.1, and 5.4.1.3 are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-5003.title: Multiple EMC Products CVE-2017-5003 Multiple Cross Site Scripting Vulnerabilities
CVE-2017-5003.body: Multiple EMC Products are prone to multiple unspecified cross-site scripting vulnerabilities. An attacker may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This can allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks.

CVE-2017-5004.title: Multiple EMC Products CVE-2017-5004 Multiple HTML Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2017-5004.body: Multiple EMC Products are prone to multiple HTML-injection vulnerabilities because they fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. Successful exploits will allow attacker-supplied HTML and script code to run in the context of the affected browser, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or control how the site is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible.

CVE-2017-5005.title: Multiple Quick Heal Products CVE-2017-5005 Stack Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2017-5005.body: Multiple Quick Heal products are prone to a stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied input. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely cause a denial-of-service condition. The following products are vulnerable: Internet Security 10.1.0.316 and earlier. Total Security 10.1.0.316 and earlier and AntiVirus Pro 10.1.0.316 and earlier.

CVE-2017-5006.title: Google Chrome Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2017-5006.body: Google Chrome is prone to multiple security vulnerabilities. Attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code in the context of the browser, bypass security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions, cause denial-of-service conditions, retrieve sensitive information; other attacks may also be possible. Versions prior to Chrome 56.0.2924.76 are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-5142.title: Honeywell XL Web II Controller Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2017-5142.body: Honeywell XL Web II Controller is prone to the following security vulnerabilities: 1. Multiple information-disclosure vulnerabilities. 2. A session-fixation vulnerability. 3. A security-bypass vulnerability. 4. A directory-traversal vulnerability. An attacker can exploit these issues to bypass security restrictions or gain access to potentially sensitive information and perform unauthorized actions in the context of a user session. Other attacks are also possible. The following XL Web II controller versions are vulnerable: XL1000C500 XLWebExe-2-01-00 and prior. XLWeb 500 XLWebExe-1-02-08 and prior.

CVE-2017-5143.title: Honeywell XL Web II Controller Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2017-5143.body: Honeywell XL Web II Controller is prone to the following security vulnerabilities: 1. Multiple information-disclosure vulnerabilities. 2. A session-fixation vulnerability. 3. A security-bypass vulnerability. 4. A directory-traversal vulnerability. An attacker can exploit these issues to bypass security restrictions or gain access to potentially sensitive information and perform unauthorized actions in the context of a user session. Other attacks are also possible. The following XL Web II controller versions are vulnerable: XL1000C500 XLWebExe-2-01-00 and prior. XLWeb 500 XLWebExe-1-02-08 and prior.

CVE-2017-5145.title: Multiple Carlo Gavazzi Products ICSA-17-012-03 Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2017-5145.body: Multiple Carlo Gavazzi products are prone to an unauthorized-access vulnerability, a cross-site request-forgery vulnerability and an information-disclosure vulnerability. Exploiting these issues may allow a remote attacker to gain access to the sensitive information, or perform certain administrative actions and gain unauthorized access to the affected application. Other attacks are also possible. VMU-C EM prior to firmware version A11_U05, and VMU-C PV prior to firmware version A17 are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-5146.title: Multiple Carlo Gavazzi Products ICSA-17-012-03 Multiple Security Vulnerabilities

CVE-2017-5149.title: Merlin@home CVE-2017-5149 Man in the Middle Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2017-5149.body: Merlin@home is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue may allow attackers to bypass certain security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions by conducting a man-in-the-middle attack. This may lead to other attacks. Versions prior to Merlin@home 8.2.2 are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-5151.title: Web Client CVE-2017-5151 Unspecified SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2017-5151.body: Web Client is prone to an unspecified SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query. An attacker can exploit this issue to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database. Web Client 6.3.5.11 and prior versions are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-5152.title: Advantech WebAccess 'updateTemplate.aspx' SQL Injection and Authentication Bypass Vulnerabilities
CVE-2017-5152.body: Advantech WebAccess is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability and an authentication-bypass vulnerability. An attacker can exploit these issues to bypass certain security restrictions, perform unauthorized actions, modify the logic of SQL queries, compromise the software, retrieve information, or modify data; other consequences are possible as well. WebAccess 8.1 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2017-5156.title: Wonderware InTouch Access Anywhere Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2017-5156.body: Wonderware InTouch Access Anywhere is prone to a cross-site request-forgery vulnerability and multiple information-disclosure vulnerabilities. A successful exploit may allow an attacker to obtain sensitive information, and perform certain unauthorized actions and gain access to the affected application. Other attacks are also possible. Wonderware InTouch Access Anywhere 11.5.2 and prior versions are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-5157.title: Schneider homeLYnk Controller LSS1001003 CVE-2017-5157 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2017-5157.body: Schneider homeLYnk Controller LSS1001003 is prone to an unspecified cross-site scripting vulnerability. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This can allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Schneider homeLYnk Controller LSS1001003 versions prior to 1.5.0 are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-5169.body: Hanwha Techwin Smart Security Manager is prone to multiple cross-site request-forgery and multiple directory-traversal vulnerabilities. Exploiting these issues may allow a remote attacker to perform certain unauthorized actions and obtain sensitive information. Other attacks are also possible.

CVE-2017-5177.title: VIPA Controls WinPLC7 CVE-2017-5177 Stack-Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2017-5177.body: VIPA Controls WinPLC7 is prone to a stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because the application fails to properly bounds-check user-supplied data before copying it into an insufficiently sized buffer. Successfully exploiting this issue allows remote attackers to crash the affected application, denying service to legitimate users. Due to the nature of this issue, arbitrary code execution may be possible but this has not been confirmed. WinPLC7 5.0.45.5921 and prior versions are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-5179.title: Nessus CVE-2017-5179 HTML Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2017-5179.body: Nessus is prone to an HTML-injection vulnerability because the application fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. Attacker-supplied HTML or JavaScript code could run in the context of the affected site, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to control how the site is rendered to the user; other attacks are also possible. Versions prior to Nessus 6.9.3 vulnerable.

CVE-2017-5182.title: Novell Open Enterprise Server CVE-2017-5182 Directory Traversal Vulnerability
CVE-2017-5182.body: Novell Open Enterprise Server is prone to a directory-traversal vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this issue using directory-traversal characters ('../') to access arbitrary files that contain sensitive information. Information harvested may aid in launching further attacks. Novell Open Enterprise Server versions prior to OES2015 SP1 before Maintenance Update 11080, OES2015 before Maintenance Update 11079, OES11 SP3 before Maintenance Update 11078, OES11 SP2 before Maintenance Update 11077 are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-5190.title: Novell NetIQ Access Manager CVE-2017-5190 Remote Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2017-5190.body: Novell NetIQ Access Manager is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. Note: This issue only occurs when using visual attributes. Attackers can exploit this issue to access sensitive information. Information obtained may lead to further attacks.

CVE-2017-5227.title: QNAP QTAP Qualcomm components Multiple Unspecified Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2017-5227.body: QNAP QTAP is prone to the following multiple security vulnerabilities: 1. Multiple unspecified command-injection vulnerabilities. [CVE-2017-6361, CVE-2017-6360, and CVE-2017-6359] These issues are further discussed in BID 97059 QNAP QTS Multiple Arbitrary Command Execution Vulnerabilities 2. Multiple unspecified stack-based vulnerabilities. 3. Multiple security-bypass vulnerabilities. 4. A directory-traversal vulnerability. 5. A click-jacking vulnerability. 6. An unspecified SQL-injection vulnerability. 7. An unspecified cross-site scripting vulnerability. 8. An unspecified heap-overflow vulnerability. 9. A security vulnerability exists due to a configuration error. [CVE-2017-5227] An attacker can exploit these issues to run arbitrary commands, execute arbitrary code, bypass security-mechanisms, gain sensitive information, gain access to the underlying database to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. Failed exploits can result in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2017-5472.title: Mozilla Firefox CVE-2017-5472 Use After Free Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2017-5472.body: Mozilla Firefox is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker may exploit this issue to crash the affected application, resulting in a denial-of-service condition. This issue is fixed in: Firefox 54 Firefox ESR 52.2

CVE-2017-5473.title: ntopng CVE-2017-5473 Multiple Cross Site Request Forgery Vulnerabilities
CVE-2017-5473.body: ntopng is prone to multiple cross-site request-forgery vulnerabilities. An attacker can exploit these issues to perform certain unauthorized actions and gain access to the affected application. Other attacks are also possible.

CVE-2017-5475.title: Serendipity CVE-2017-5475 Cross Site Request Forgery Vulnerability
CVE-2017-5475.body: Serendipity is prone to a cross-site request-forgery vulnerability due to insufficient CSRF protection. An attacker can exploit this issue to perform certain unauthorized actions and gain access to the affected application. Other attacks are also possible.

CVE-2017-5476.title: Serendipity CVE-2017-5476 Cross Site Request Forgery Vulnerability
CVE-2017-5476.body: Serendipity is prone to a cross-site request-forgery vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to perform certain unauthorized actions and gain access to the affected application. Other attacks are also possible. Serendipity version 2.0.5 and prior versions are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-5480.title: b2evolution CVE-2017-5480 Directory Traversal Vulnerability
CVE-2017-5480.body: b2evolution is prone to a directory-traversal vulnerability because the application fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. Remote attackers may use a specially crafted request with directory-traversal sequences ('../') to retrieve sensitive information and execute arbitrary code on server side. This may aid in further attacks. b2evolution versions6.8.3 and prior are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-5482.title: tcpdump Multiple Buffer Overflow Vulnerabilities
CVE-2017-5482.body: tcpdump is prone to multiple buffer-overflow vulnerabilities because it fails to adequately bounds-check user-supplied data before copying it to an insufficiently sized memory buffer. An attacker can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code within the context of the application. Failed exploit attempts will likely cause a denial-of-service condition. Versions prior to tcpdump 4.9.0 are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-5487.title: WordPress Prior to 4.7.1 Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2017-5487.body: WordPress is prone to an information disclosure vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to gain access to sensitive information that may aid in further attacks. WordPress 4.7 and prior are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-5488.title: WordPress Prior to 4.7.1 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2017-5488.body: WordPress is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks. Versions prior to WordPress 4.7.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-5489.title: WordPress Prior to 4.7.1 Cross Site Request Forgery Vulnerability
CVE-2017-5489.body: WordPress is prone to a cross-site request-forgery vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to perform unauthorized actions in the context of a logged-in user of the affected application. This may aid in other attacks. Versions prior to WordPress 4.7.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-5495.title: Quagga CVE-2017-5495 Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2017-5495.body: Quagga is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Exploiting this issue allows remote attackers to cause a denial-of-service condition. Quagga 0.93 through 1.1.0 are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-5503.title: JasPer 'jpc_t1dec.c' Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2017-5503.body: JasPer is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to cause denial-of-service conditions. Due to the nature of this issue, arbitrary code execution may be possible but this has not been confirmed. JasPer 1.900.27 is vulnerable; prior versions may also be affected.

CVE-2017-5504.title: JasPer 'jpc/jpc_dec.c' Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2017-5504.body: JasPer is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to cause a denial-of-service condition. JasPer 1.900.27 is vulnerable; prior versions may also be affected.

CVE-2017-5505.title: JasPer 'jas_seq.c' Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2017-5505.body: JasPer is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to cause denial-of-service conditions. CVE-2017-5508.title: ImageMagick CVE-2017-5508 Local Heap Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2017-5508.body: ImageMagick is prone to an local heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability. A local attacker can leverage this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of affected application. Failed attempts may lead to denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2017-5509.title: Imagemagick CVE-2017-5509 Out of Bounds Write Local Memory Corruption Vulnerability
CVE-2017-5509.body: Imagemagick is prone to a local memory-corruption vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely cause denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2017-5510.title: ImageMagick CVE-2017-5510 Local Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2017-5510.body: ImageMagick is prone to a local denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to crash the affected application, resulting in denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2017-5511.title: ImageMagick CVE-2017-5511 Local Heap Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2017-5511.body: ImageMagick is prone to an local heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability. A local attacker can leverage this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of affected application. Failed attempts may lead to denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2017-5515.title: GeniXCMS CVE-2017-5515 Multiple Cross Site Scripting Vulnerabilities
CVE-2017-5515.body: GeniXCMS is prone to multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may let the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. GeniXCMS 0.0.8 and prior versions are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-5516.title: GeniXCMS CVE-2017-5516 Multiple Cross Site Scripting Vulnerabilities
CVE-2017-5516.body: GeniXCMS is prone to multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. CVE-2017-5517.title: GeniXCMS 'author.control.php' SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2017-5517.body: GeniXCMS is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query. A successful exploit may allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database.

CVE-2017-5519.title: GeniXCMS 'Posts.class.php' Multiple SQL Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2017-5519.body: GeniXCMS is prone to multiple SQL-injection vulnerabilities because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query. A successful exploit may allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database. GeniXCMS 0.0.8 and prior are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-5537.title: Weblate CVE-2017-5537 Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2017-5537.body: Weblate is prone to a information-disclosure vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information that may aid in further attacks.

CVE-2017-5539.title: b2evolution Incomplete Fix CVE-2017-5539 Directory Traversal Vulnerability
CVE-2017-5539.body: b2evolution is prone to a directory-traversal vulnerability because the application fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. Remote attackers may use a specially crafted request with directory-traversal sequences ('../') to retrieve sensitive information and delete arbitrary files on server. This may aid in further attacks. NOTE: This issue is the result of an incomplete fix for the issue described in BID 95454 (b2evolution CVE-2017-5480 Directory Traversal Vulnerability). b2evolution versions 6.8.4 and prior are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-5541.title: Symphony CVE-2017-5541 Directory Traversal Vulnerability
CVE-2017-5541.body: Symphony is prone to a directory-traversal vulnerability because the application fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. Remote attackers may use a specially crafted request with directory-traversal sequences ('../') to retrieve sensitive information and execute arbitrary code on server side. This may aid in further attacks. Versions prior to Symphony 2.6.10 are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-5542.title: Symphony CMS CVE-2017-5542 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2017-5542.body: Symphony CMS is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks. Versions prior to Symphony CMS 2.6.10 are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-5543.title: Subrion CMS CVE-2017-5543 PHP Object Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2017-5543.body: Subrion CMS is prone to a PHP object injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. Attackers can exploit this issue to inject arbitrary object in to the application to delete files, view files and execute local script code and to access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database execute arbitrary PHP code through specially crafted serialized objects. Subrion CMS 4.0.5 is vulnerable;other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2017-5545.title: Libimobiledevice Libplist 'plistutil.c' Heap Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2017-5545.body: libimobiledevice libplist is prone to heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability. An attacker may exploit this issue to cause a denial-of-service condition or gain sensitive information.

CVE-2017-5547.title: Linux Kernel CVE-2017-5547 Local Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2017-5547.body: Linux Kernel is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to cause a kernel crash, denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2017-5548.title: Linux Kernel CVE-2017-5548 Local Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2017-5548.body: Linux Kernel is prone to a local denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to cause denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2017-5550.title: Linux Kernel CVE-2017-5550 Local Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2017-5550.body: The Linux kernel is prone to a local information-disclosure vulnerability. Local attackers can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information that may lead to further attacks.

CVE-2017-5553.title: b2evolution CVE-2017-5553 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2017-5553.body: b2evolution is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks. Versions prior to b2evolution 6.8.5 are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-5563.title: LibTIFF CVE-2017-5563 Heap Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2017-5563.body: LibTIFF is prone to a heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to cause denial-of-service conditions. Due to the nature of this issue, code-execution may be possible but this has not been confirmed. LibTIFF 4.0.7 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2017-5572.title: Citrix XenServer CVE-2017-5572 Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2017-5572.body: Citrix XenServer is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to cause denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2017-5574.title: GeniXCMS CVE-2017-5574 SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2017-5574.body: GeniXCMS is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query. A successful exploit may allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database. Versions prior to GeniXCMS 1.0.0 are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-5575.title: GeniXCMS CVE-2017-5575 SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2017-5575.body: GeniXCMS is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query. A successful exploit may allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database. GeniXCMS versions prior to 1.0.0 are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-5576.body: Linux Kernel is prone to a remote integer-overflow vulnerability. Attackers may exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application. Failed exploits may result in denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2017-5580.body: Virglrenderer is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to crash the QEMU instance, resulting in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2017-5581.title: TigerVNC CVE-2017-5581 Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2017-5581.body: TigerVNC is prone to a buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to adequately bounds-check user-supplied data before copying it to an insufficiently sized memory buffer. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the application. Failed exploit attempts will likely cause a denial-of-service condition.

Successful exploits will result in the execution of arbitrary attacker-supplied HTML and script code in the context of the affected application, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or control how the page is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible. PAN-OS 6.1.15 and prior, 7.0.12 and prior, PAN-OS 7.1.7 and prior are vulnerable.

An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This can allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks. Versions prior to Groovel 3.3.7-beta are vulnerable.

An attacker may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may let the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. phpipam 1.2 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2017-6837.body: audiofile is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to crash the affected application, resulting in denial-of-service conditions. audiofile is 0.3.6 vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2017-6864.title: Siemens RUGGEDCOM ROX I ICSA-17-087-01 Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2017-6864.body: Siemens RUGGEDCOM ROX I is prone to the following security vulnerabilities: : 1. A HTML-injection vulnerability 2. A cross-site scripting vulnerability 3. An information-disclosure vulnerability 4. An authorization-bypass vulnerability 5. A cross-site request-forgery vulnerability An attacker may leverage these issues to execute HTML and script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site, disclose sensitive information, perform certain unauthorized actions actions, gain unauthorized access, or bypass certain security restrictions.

CVE-2017-6868.title: Siemens SIMATIC CP 44x-1 Redundant CVE-2017-6868 Authentication Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2017-6868.body: Siemens SIMATIC CP 44x-1 Redundant is prone to an authentication-bypass vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to bypass the authentication mechanism and perform unauthorized actions. This may aid in further attacks. SIMATIC CP 44x-1 RNA versions prior to 1.4.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-6874.title: Linux kernel CVE-2017-6874 Use After Free Local Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2017-6874.body: Linux kernel is prone to a local denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to cause a local denial-of-service condition. Due to the nature of this issue, code-execution may be possible; however this has not been confirmed.

CVE-2017-6886.title: LibRaw CVE-2017-6886 Memory Corruption Vulnerability
CVE-2017-6886.body: LibRaw is prone to a memory-corruption vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to cause a denial-of-service condition. LibRaw 0.18.1 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2017-6887.title: LibRaw CVE-2017-6887 Memory Corruption Vulnerability
CVE-2017-6887.body: LibRaw is prone to a memory-corruption vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely cause denial-of-service conditions. LibRaw versions prior to 0.18.2 are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-6891.title: GnuTLS CVE-2017-6891 Stack Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2017-6891.body: GnuTLS is prone to a stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely cause a denial-of-service condition. GnuTLS version 4.10 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2017-6905.title: concrete5 Multiple Cross Site Scripting Vulnerabilities
CVE-2017-6905.body: concrete5 is prone to multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks.

CVE-2017-6952.title: Capstone 'winkernel_mm.c' Integer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2017-6952.body: Capstone is prone to an integer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to properly bounds-check user-supplied data before copying it into an insufficiently sized buffer. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result in denial-of-service conditions. Capstone 3.0.4 and prior are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-6954.title: Wordpress BuddyPress Plugin CVE-2017-6954 Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2017-6954.body: BuddyPress Plugin for Wordpress is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to bypass security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions; this may aid in launching further attacks. Versions prior to BuddyPress 1.9.3 are vulnerable.
