CVE-2017-6973.title: MantisBT CVE-2017-6973 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2017-6973.body: MantisBT is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. LibTIFF 4.0.7 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2017-7606.title: ImageMagick 'coders/rle.c' Remote Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2017-7606.body: ImageMagick is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to crash the affected application, resulting in denial-of-service conditions. ImageMagick 7.0.5-4 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2017-7607.title: elfutils CVE-2017-7607 Remote Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2017-7607.body: elfutils is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to crash the affected application, resulting in denial-of-service conditions. elfutils 0.168 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2017-7608.title: elfutils CVE-2017-7608 Remote Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2017-7608.body: elfutils is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to crash the affected application, resulting in denial-of-service conditions. elfutils 0.168 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2017-7623.title: ImageWorsener 'src/imagew-miff.c' Remote Heap Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2017-7623.body: ImageWorsener is prone to a heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability . An attacker can exploit this issue to crash the affected application, resulting in denial-of-service conditions. Due to the nature of this issue, arbitrary code execution may be possible but this has not been confirmed. ImageWorsener 1.3.0 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2017-7625.title: Fiyo CMS '/dapur/apps/app_theme/libs/save_file.php' Arbitrary File Upload Vulnerability
CVE-2017-7625.body: Fiyo CMS is prone to an arbitrary file-upload vulnerability. An attacker may leverage this issue to upload arbitrary files to the affected system; this can result in arbitrary code execution within the context of the affected system. Fiyo CMS 2.0 through 2.0.7 are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-7645.title: Linux Kernel CVE-2017-7645 Multiple Denial of Service Vulnerabilities
CVE-2017-7645.body: Linux kernel is prone to multiple denial-of-service vulnerabilities. Attackers can exploit these issues to causes a denial-of-service condition. Linux kernel 4.10.11 and prior versions are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-7650.title: Mosquitto CVE-2017-7650 Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2017-7650.body: Mosquitto is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. An attacker may exploit this issue to bypass certain security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions. Mosquitto 0.15 through 1.4.11 are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-7659.title: Apache HTTP Server CVE-2017-7659 Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2017-7659.body: Apache HTTP Server is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers may leverage this issue to crash the server process, denying service to legitimate users. Versions prior to Apache HTTP Server 2.4.26 are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-7660.title: Apache Solr CVE-2017-7660 Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2017-7660.body: Apache Solr is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to bypass certain security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions. This may aid in further attacks. The following versions are affected: Apache Solr 5.3 through 5.5.4 and Apache Solr 6.0 through 6.5.1

CVE-2017-7668.title: Apache HTTP Server CVE-2017-7668 Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2017-7668.body: Apache HTTP Server is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers may leverage this issue to cause a denial-of-service condition, denying service to legitimate users. Apache HTTP Server 2.2.32 and 2.4.25 are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-7672.title: Apache Struts CVE-2017-7672 Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2017-7672.body: Apache Struts is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to cause a denial-of-service condition, denying service to legitimate users. Apache Struts 2.5 through 2.5.10.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-7675.title: Apache Tomcat CVE-2017-7675 Directory Traversal Vulnerability
CVE-2017-7675.body: Apache Tomcat is prone to a directory-traversal vulnerability because the application fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. Remote attackers may use a specially crafted request with directory-traversal sequences ('../') to retrieve arbitrary files from the affected system in the context of the application. Information obtained could aid in further attacks. The following versions are affected: Tomcat 9.0.0.M1 through 9.0.0.M21 Tomcat 8.5.0 through 8.5.15

CVE-2017-7679.title: Apache HTTP Server CVE-2017-7679 Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2017-7679.body: Apache HTTP Server is prone to a buffer-overflow vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to cause denial-of-service conditions. Due to the nature of this issue, arbitrary code execution may be possible but this has not been confirmed. The following versions are vulnerable: Apache HTTP Server 2.2.0 to 2.2.32 Apache HTTP Server 2.4.0 to 2.4.25

CVE-2017-7692.title: Squirrelmail CVE-2017-7692 Command Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2017-7692.body: Squirrelmail is prone to a remote command-injection vulnerability. Successful exploit allows an attacker to inject and execute arbitrary commands in context of the affected application. Squirrelmail version 1.4.22 and prior are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-7694.title: Symphony CMS CVE-2017-7694 Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2017-7694.body: Symphony CMS is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue may allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts may cause a denial-of-service condition. Symphony CMS 2.6.11 and prior versions are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-7697.title: libsamplerate 'src_sinc.c' Local Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2017-7697.body: libsamplerate is prone to a local buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied data. An attacker can exploit this issue to crash the affected application, resulting in denial-of-service condition. Due to the nature of this issue, arbitrary code execution may be possible but this has not been confirmed. Versions prior to libsamplerate 1.0.9 are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-7718.title: QEMU 'hw/display/cirrus_vga_rop.h' Multiple Memory Corruption Vulnerabilities
CVE-2017-7718.body: QEMU is prone to multiple memory-corruption vulnerabilities. Attackers can exploit these issues to obtain sensitive information or to crash the affected application, resulting in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2017-7732.title: Fortinet FortiMail CVE-2017-7732 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2017-7732.body: Fortinet FortiMail is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Fortinet FortiMail 5.1 and prior, 5.2.0 through 5.2.9 and 5.3.0 through 5.3.9 are vulnerable.

EMC Data Protection Advisor versions prior to 6.4 are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-8003.body: EMC Data Protection Advisor is prone to a directory-traversal vulnerability and multiple SQL-injection vulnerabilities. CVE-2017-8067.body: The Linux Kernel is prone to a local denial-of-service vulnerability. A local attacker can exploit this issue to crash the affected application resulting in denial-of-service conditions. Linux Kernel versions 4.9.x and 4.10.x prior to 4.10.12 are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-8068.title: RETIRED: Linux Kernel 'drivers/net/usb/rtl8150.c' Local Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2017-8068.body: The Linux Kernel is prone to a local denial-of-service vulnerability. A local attacker can exploit this issue to crash the affected application.resulting in denial-of-service conditions. Other attacks are also possible. Linux Kernel versions 4.9.x prior to 4.9.11 are vulnerable. This BID is being retired as a duplicate of BID 98000 Linux Kernel 'drivers/net/usb/pegasus.c' Local Denial of Service Vulnerability.

CVE-2017-8068.title: Linux Kernel 'drivers/net/usb/pegasus.c' Local Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2017-8068.body: The Linux Kernel is prone to a local denial-of-service vulnerability. A local attacker can exploit this issue to crash the affected application.resulting in denial-of-service conditions. Other attacks are also possible. Linux Kernel versions 4.9.x prior to 4.9.11 are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-8070.title: Linux Kernel 'drivers/net/usb/catc.c' Local Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2017-8070.body: The Linux Kernel is prone to a local denial-of-service vulnerability. A local attacker can exploit this issue to crash the affected application.resulting in denial-of-service conditions. Other attacks are also possible. Linux Kernel versions 4.9.x prior to 4.9.11 are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-8073.title: WeeChat CVE-2017-8073 Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2017-8073.body: WeeChat is prone to a buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to properly bounds-check user-supplied input before copying it to an insufficiently sized memory buffer. An attacker can exploit this issue to cause a denial-of-service conditions. Due to the nature of this issue, code-execution may be possible but this has not been confirmed. Versions prior to WeeChat 1.7.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-8085.title: Exponent CMS CVE-2017-8085 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2017-8085.body: Exponent CMS is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may let the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Versions prior to Exponent 2.4.1 Patch5 are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-8105.title: FreeType 2 CVE-2017-8105 Out of Bounds Write Heap Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2017-8105.body: FreeType 2 is prone to a remote heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied input. Attackers may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application. Failed attacks will cause denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2017-8109.title: SaltStack Salt CVE-2017-8109 Local Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2017-8109.body: SaltStack Salt is prone to a local information-disclosure vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information that may aid in launching further attacks. Versions prior to SaltStack Salt 2016.11.4 are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-8114.title: RoundCube Webmail CVE-2017-8114 Multiple Privilege Escalation Vulnerabilities
CVE-2017-8114.body: RoundCube Webmail is prone to multiple privilege escalation vulnerabilities. An attackers may exploit these issues to gain elevated privileges. RoundCube Webmail versions prior to 1.0.11, 1.1.x prior to 1.1.9, and 1.2.x prior to 1.2.5 are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-8248.title: Apple iOS APPLE-SA-2017-07-19-1 Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2017-8248.body: Apple iOS is prone to multiple security vulnerabilities. Successful exploits will allow attackers to perform unauthorized actions, execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected device or cause denial-of-service conditions; other attacks may also be possible.

CVE-2017-8248.title: Qualcomm Closed-Source Components Multiple Unspecified Vulnerabilities
CVE-2017-8248.body: Qualcomm Closed-Source Components are prone to multiple unspecified vulnerabilities. An attacker can exploit these issues to perform unauthorized actions. This may aid in further attacks. These issues are being tracked by Android Bug IDs A-78135902, A-66913713, A-67712316, A-79419833, A-109678200, A-78283451, A-78285196, A-78284194, A-78284753, A-78284517, A-78240177, A-78239686, A-78284545, A-109660689, A-78240324, A-68141338, A-78286046, A-73539037, A-73539235, A-71501115, A-33757308, A-74236942, A-77485184, A-77484529, A-33385206, A-79419639, A-79420511, A-109678338, and A-112279564.

CVE-2017-8260.body: Google Android is prone to multiple security vulnerabilities. An attacker can leverage these issues to obtain sensitive information, and execute arbitrary code with elevated privileges in the context of the kernel. Failed exploit attempts may result in a denial of service condition.

CVE-2017-8287.title: FreeType 2 CVE-2017-8287 Out of Bounds Write Heap Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2017-8287.body: FreeType 2 is prone to a remote heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied input. Attackers may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application. Failed attacks will cause denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2017-8288.body: gnome-shell is prone to a local security-bypass vulnerability. A local attacker can exploit this issue to bypass certain security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions; this may aid in launching further attacks. GNOME gnome-shell 3.22 through 3.24.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-8294.body: YARA is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to crash the affected application, denying service to legitimate users. YARA 3.5.0 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2017-8310.body: VLAN VLC is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. A remote attacker can exploit this issue to cause a denial-of-service condition. VLAN VLC versions 2.2.x are vulnerable.

CVE-2017-8311.body: VideoLAN VLC is prone to a heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application. CVE-2017-9810.body: Kaspersky Anti-Virus for Linux File Server is prone to the following multiple security vulnerabilities: 1. A cross-site request-forgery vulnerability 2. A privilege-escalation vulnerability 3. A cross-site scripting vulnerability 4. A directory-traversal vulnerability Exploiting these issues will allow an attacker to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site, obtain sensitive information, execute arbitrary code with root privileges, and perform unauthorized actions. Failed exploits can result in a denial-of-service condition. Kaspersky Anti-Virus for Linux File Server 8.0.3.297 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.
